translation.en: MAN 1: Fire! MAN 2: Stand back!
translation.zh: 退回去！

translation.en: Everyone go into the woods!
translation.zh: 弟兄们，到林子里去！

translation.en: MAN: Fire!
translation.zh: -开火！-撤！

translation.en: You okay? Come on, Bob. Bring him over that way.
translation.zh: 没事吧？ -来，鲍伯！这边！-你没事吧？

translation.en: Captain, you all right? Get down!
translation.zh: 趴下

translation.en: Gatling! They got a Gatling! Goddamn it, Cole!
translation.zh: 格林！他们有格林机关枪 见鬼，科尔！这两年前就已经老套了

translation.en: This stopped being fun about two years ago!
translation.zh: 见鬼，科尔！这两年前就已经老套了

translation.en: MAN: Move that wagon!
translation.zh: 把马车移开！

translation.en: Stand clear! Get down! Fire!
translation.zh: -蹲下！-开火！

translation.en: Cole, Bob, you boys okay? Yeah.
translation.zh: 科尔，鲍伯，没事吧？ 杀扬格兄弟一门炮可不够

translation.en: Take more than a cannon to kill the younger brothers, sir!
translation.zh: 杀扬格兄弟一门炮可不够

translation.en: I think the cannon's doing a pretty good job, Cole!
translation.zh: 大炮太厉害了，科尔！

translation.en: Some Indian tracker you turned out to be, Tom.
translation.zh: 你算什么印地安追踪者，汤姆

translation.en: You paid me to find your bluecoats. There they are.
translation.zh: 你付钱让我去找蓝军他们就在那儿

translation.en: Get me the James boy. You want Jesse?
translation.zh: -把詹姆斯找来-杰西？

translation.en: No, not Jesse. I want the one that can shoot.
translation.zh: 不，不是杰西我要那个会射击的

translation.en: Frank! Frank!
translation.zh: -弗兰克！-弗兰克！

translation.en: MAN: Hold your ground! Frank, up front!
translation.zh: 坚守阵地！ 弗兰克，到前面来！

translation.en: Jesse, watch your back!
translation.zh: 杰西，小心后面

translation.en: Cannon or Gatling? MAN: Fire!
translation.zh: -大炮还是机关枪？-开火！

translation.en: Cannon! Cannons.
translation.zh: -大炮！-大炮

translation.en: Where you been, buddy? What's goin' on?
translation.zh: -你去哪了？-怎么了？

translation.en: Well, nothin' really.
translation.zh: 没什么

translation.en: Every time I put my head up to hit that Gatling,
translation.zh: 我一抬起头，他们就朝我开枪

translation.en: they try and shoot it off. We got a plan?
translation.zh: 我一抬起头，他们就朝我开枪 -我们有计划吗？-坐在这里吓破胆这计划就不错

translation.en: Yeah, my plan of lying here pissin' myself seems to be workin' mighty fine! Thank you!
translation.zh: -我们有计划吗？-坐在这里吓破胆这计划就不错

translation.en: Listen, I can hit those boys from here. We just need a distraction.
translation.zh: 只要能分散他们的注意力我就能击中这些人

translation.en: A distraction? Why the hell didn't you just say so?
translation.zh: 分散注意力？你怎么不早说？

translation.en: He's smilin'. That's never a good thing.
translation.zh: -他在笑-这绝不是好事

translation.en: Get that rider!
translation.zh: 对准骑马的人！

translation.en: [WHOOPING] We're comin', Jesse! MAN: Head out!
translation.zh: -我们来了，杰西！-上啊！

translation.en: Take the hill! Charge!
translation.zh: 上山，冲啊！

translation.en: Fall back!
translation.zh: 撤！

translation.en: Go!
translation.zh: 上！

translation.en: Go on, git. Git!
translation.zh: 走，滚！

translation.en: Go on! Go on!
translation.zh: 走！走！

translation.en: Distracting enough for you? They hardly even noticed you.
translation.zh: -够分散注意力吧？-他们根本没注意到

translation.en: So you're saying I could've done more to attract their attention.
translation.zh: -我还应该多做点？-当然！

translation.en: Uh-huh. Such as? Well, you could've worn one of those big floppy women's Easter Sunday bonnets.
translation.zh: -例如？-你可以戴顶女士的帽子

translation.en: Yeah, that would've made an impression. Uh-huh, I figured.
translation.zh: -那样印象会更深-我知道

translation.en: See, that's your problem, Frank. By the time you finish figurin' out stuff, well, I'm already finished doin' it.'
translation.zh: 那是你的问题，弗兰克你想好前，我都完成了

translation.en: No, Jesse, see, your problem is you're always doin' stuff before I'm finished figuring it out.
translation.zh: 你总是在我想好前开始干

translation.en: Ooh, goddamn, boy! Wait till we get back to Missouri.
translation.zh: 见鬼，兄弟！等我们回密苏里

translation.en: Tell all them little gals 'bout how little Jesse James here charged the whole Union army by hisself.
translation.zh: 告诉那些女生们杰西·詹姆斯是如何一个人对付整个军队的

translation.en: Hey, Cole, he keeps that up, he's liable to outrank you soon. Well, but I'll still be better-looking, won't I?
translation.zh: -再这样下去，他的军衔就比你高了-但还是我比较帅，对吗？

translation.en: MALCOLM: Let's meet on that road over to the South!
translation.zh: 我们在南路上见吧

translation.en: See if we can't get those Yankees Jesse here scared off. Hyah!
translation.zh: 看看能不能抓到被杰西吓跑的北方佬

translation.en: Ride with me, cousin. I could use the walk.
translation.zh: -跟我一起骑马吧，表弟-我走路就行了

translation.en: All right. Suit yourself. We'll have some horses waitin' for you at the road. Fine.
translation.zh: 好吧，路上会有马等着你的

translation.en: All right, rangers. Let's ride!
translation.zh: 好，骑兵们，出发！

translation.en: Now, I would sound just stupid saying something like that.
translation.zh: 如果我来说听上去会很愚蠢

translation.en: Where you boys going? There's Yankees back there.
translation.zh: 你们去哪里？ -那里还有很多北方佬-战争结束了

translation.en: Lots of 'em. The war's over, son.
translation.zh: -那里还有很多北方佬-战争结束了 李将军昨天在阿波马托克斯投降了

translation.en: General Lee surrendered yesterday at Appomattox.
translation.zh: 李将军昨天在阿波马托克斯投降了

translation.en: Yesterday. Well, somebody better go tell the damn Yankees.
translation.zh: -昨天-最好有人去告诉北方佬！

translation.en: What do you reckon, cousin? Home. Cole, we go home.
translation.zh: -有什么打算，表弟？-回家，科尔，我们回家

translation.en: And we ride like hell to get there. God help any fool who tries to come between me and my farm again.
translation.zh: 如果有哪个傻瓜要挡我回农场之路，上帝保佑他

translation.en: Now, that's the best damn plan I heard all war.
translation.zh: 这是我在战争中听过的最好的计划

translation.en: Well, boys, let's ride!
translation.zh: 好吧，兄弟们，出发！

translation.en: Hello, Liberty, Missouri. Let's go home, back to our farms.
translation.zh: -你好，自由镇，密苏里州！-我们回家，回我们的农场去！

translation.en: Plantin' corn, harvestin' corn and eatin' corn.
translation.zh: 种玉米，收玉米，吃玉米

translation.en: Corn gonna shoot at me? No.
translation.zh: -玉米会向我开枪吗？-不会

translation.en: Then I love it. Let's go.
translation.zh: -那太好了-我们走！

translation.en: We got problems.
translation.zh: 有麻烦了

translation.en: FRANK: Got a garrison in town. We're in occupied territory, boys.
translation.zh: 镇上有军营我们在被占领的领地上

translation.en: Hands off your hip, Cole. You ain't scared, are you, Jesse?
translation.zh: -别拿枪，科尔-你怕了吧，杰西？

translation.en: Pick your fights, cousin. You taught me that.
translation.zh: 选值得的打，是你教我的

translation.en: Jesus, mercy. That's Charlie Higgins.
translation.zh: -耶稣宽恕他吧-是查理希格森

translation.en: I'm cuttin' him down. Not now, Cole.
translation.zh: -我去放他下来-现在不行，科尔

translation.en: What in the hell is wrong with you?
translation.zh: -我去放他下来-现在不行，科尔 -你怎么了？-如果我们要杀他们…

translation.en: In case we have to kill these son of a bitches
translation.zh: -你怎么了？-如果我们要杀他们…

translation.en: I don't want 'em to see us comin'.
translation.zh: 我不想事先警告他们

translation.en: I want to get back to the farm and make sure little Jim and the girls are okay.
translation.zh: 我得确保吉姆和那些女生安然无恙

translation.en: Yeah, and stop by our spread after that and tell our ma we're all right. We'll go see Doc Mimms.
translation.zh: 顺便向我们的妈妈报个平安我们去拜访下明斯医生

translation.en: Excuse me, sir. We're here for the doctor.
translation.zh: 对不起，先生我们来找医生

translation.en: Jesse. Frank!
translation.zh: -杰西，弗兰克-齐瑞拉？

translation.en: Zerelda? Little Zee Mimms?
translation.zh: -杰西，弗兰克-齐瑞拉？ 小齐明斯？你就是小杰西·詹姆斯

translation.en: Well, you were little Jesse James when you left!
translation.zh: 小齐明斯？你就是小杰西·詹姆斯

translation.en: Yeah, but you got big. I-I mean, Zee, you aged.
translation.zh: 是啊，不过你变大了！我是说，齐，你变老了！

translation.en: And what I mean is, in a good way you got, you got big and older.
translation.zh: 我是夸奖，你长得又大又老

translation.en: Frank, will you say something please? No, you're doing just fine.
translation.zh: -弗兰克，你说呀-不用，你说得很好

translation.en: Frank? Jesse? Daddy!
translation.zh: -弗兰克，杰西-爸爸

translation.en: Where's Web? He rode right into 'em, screamin' like a banshee.
translation.zh: -韦伯在哪里？-他骑着马尖叫着冲向他们

translation.en: My little Web did that? He jumped his horse clear over our heads,
translation.zh: -韦伯有那样的表现？-他骑马从我们头上越过

translation.en: killed a dozen Union soldiers before they knew what him 'em.
translation.zh: 以迅雷不及掩耳之势杀了十二个人

translation.en: Took out the Gatling gun and the cannon all by himself. Saved all our lives, doc.
translation.zh: -干掉了一台机关枪和大炮-救了大家的命，医生

translation.en: But none of the Liberty boys would have come home if not for Web Mimms.
translation.zh: 没有韦伯，自由镇的人一个都回不来，真的

translation.en: God's honest truth. Web died fighting?
translation.zh: 没有韦伯，自由镇的人一个都回不来，真的 -韦伯是战死的？-韦伯像个英雄一样牺牲了

translation.en: Web died a hero.
translation.zh: -韦伯是战死的？-韦伯像个英雄一样牺牲了

translation.en: Still died.
translation.zh: 但还是死了

translation.en: Look, doc, if there's anything we can do for you we want to help.
translation.zh: 医生，如果有什么我们可以做的，我们想帮你

translation.en: Start thinking about yourselves. Don't end up like Charlie Higgins.
translation.zh: 为自己着想吧别最后和查理·希格森一样

translation.en: They found out Charlie rode with Quantrill's raiders.
translation.zh: 他们发现他是个关崔尔奇袭者

translation.en: They arrested him. They tried him by military tribunal and they hanged him this morning.
translation.zh: 他们逮捕了他送上军事法庭然后处以绞刑

translation.en: Well, I thought there was a general amnesty. For soldiers, yes. But if you rode
translation.zh: -但应该有大赦的-如果你是游击队的就没有

translation.en: in one of the partisan bands, they'll hang you for treason.
translation.zh: -但应该有大赦的-如果你是游击队的就没有 你们拥有农场就更危险了

translation.en: And you boys are in more danger because you've got a farm.
translation.zh: 你们拥有农场就更危险了

translation.en: See, the railroad men come through offering to buy up land. Nobody sells.
translation.zh: 铁路公司的人说来买这里的地皮，没人肯卖

translation.en: So the army starts hanging men who own farms for treason.
translation.zh: 军队就以背叛的名义处死拥有农场的人

translation.en: During the war, all we thought about was coming home.
translation.zh: 战争中我们一心想着回家

translation.en: And I swore I'd kill anybody who'd try to get me off my farm again now.
translation.zh: 谁想抢我的农场我就杀了他

translation.en: If I have to go to war with the railroad to stay, that's fine by me.
translation.zh: 如果我必须和铁路作战我很乐意

translation.en: FRANK: All right, wait, look. Let's think about this.
translation.zh: 让我们考虑一下

translation.en: If we have a good story and we stick to it, we should be all right. What story are they gonna believe, Frank?
translation.zh: -如果我们编个故事，就没事-他们会相信什么故事？

translation.en: Hmm, you were in the Confederate army
translation.zh: 你们在胡德将军的得克萨斯的军队服役…

translation.en: with General Hood's Texas army until, say, Sharpsburg,
translation.zh: 你们在胡德将军的得克萨斯的军队服役… 直到夏普斯堡然后被派到斯图亚特将军的骑兵队

translation.en: where you were reassigned to General Stuart's cavalry
translation.zh: 直到夏普斯堡然后被派到斯图亚特将军的骑兵队

translation.en: until you surrendered in Tennessee.
translation.zh: 最后在田纳西投降

translation.en: That...just might work. DOC MIMMS: Yeah, that might just work.
translation.zh: -可能行-是的，可能行

translation.en: Now, go on and see your ma.
translation.zh: 现在去看看你们的妈妈

translation.en: She'll be glad to see her sons alive.
translation.zh: 她会很高兴看到自己的儿子们还活着

translation.en: And for her sake... stay that way.
translation.zh: 看在她的份上，好好活下去

translation.en: Thank you for everything. Especially that story that you told my father.
translation.zh: 感谢你们做的一切尤其是对我父亲讲的故事

translation.en: Now, look, Zee-- I'm goin' to go cry now.
translation.zh: 听着，齐…我现在要去哭了

translation.en: That Zerelda turned into a hell of a woman, eh?
translation.zh: -齐瑞拉变成优秀的女子了-是啊

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Big and older?
translation.zh: -齐瑞拉变成优秀的女子了-是啊 -“又大又老”-闭嘴，弗兰克

translation.en: You can shut up now, Frank. You are a charmer.
translation.zh: -“又大又老”-闭嘴，弗兰克 你很迷人

translation.en: I swear to God I will shoot you in your sleep. Next time try "fat and haggard."
translation.zh: -我要杀了你-下次，试试“又胖又憔悴”

translation.en: Boys? My boys!
translation.zh: 孩子们！孩子们！

translation.en: My boys! My boys are alive!
translation.zh: 孩子们，我的孩子们都活着？哦，我的上帝！

translation.en: Oh, God! Praise God! You're alive!
translation.zh: 孩子们，我的孩子们都活着？哦，我的上帝！ -感谢上帝，你们还活着！-你不松手，我们就得闷死了，妈

translation.en: Well, not if you don't ease up a bit, Ma.
translation.zh: -感谢上帝，你们还活着！-你不松手，我们就得闷死了，妈

translation.en: Did you kill Yankees? A fair number, Ma.
translation.zh: -你们杀了北方佬吗？-挺多

translation.en: And did you say your prayers? Every night, Ma.
translation.zh: -祈祷了吗？-每晚都祈祷

translation.en: Good. Oh, now, come on inside and wash your hands for dinner.
translation.zh: 好，进来洗手用晚餐

translation.en: Oh, and you look so good. Oh! You look great! MA: Oh, come on. FRANK: Whoo!
translation.zh: -妈妈，你看起来很好-不，是棒极了！

translation.en: Howdy, boys. Look at Jimmy Younger, all grown up.
translation.zh: 你们好啊看看小吉姆，都长大了

translation.en: How ya doin'? All right.
translation.zh: -怎么样？-很好

translation.en: Your ma wouldn't let us leave until we ate somethin'.
translation.zh: -你妈妈留我们吃饭-那是两小时前的事

translation.en: That was about two hours ago. I don't see clean plates.
translation.zh: -你妈妈留我们吃饭-那是两小时前的事 盘里还有吃的

translation.en: Ma, glad to see you being so nice to our Indian friend. MA: Ah, he's a good Christian, and he killed Yankees.
translation.zh: 谢谢你接纳汤姆他是个基督徒还杀了北方佬

translation.en: And Jesus told me that made him an all right boy. Well, she's still talkin' to Jesus.
translation.zh: -耶稣告诉我说他是个好人-她还在和耶稣说话

translation.en: You know, what worries me is that Jesus is talkin' back. I heard that.
translation.zh: -问题是他还会回答-我听见了

translation.en: JESSE: Come on, Frank. FRANK: You play me that eight.
translation.zh: -得了吧，弗兰克-我们玩这个

translation.en: You ever-- Ever notice Zerelda's eyes?
translation.zh: -你有注意到齐瑞拉的眼睛吗？-注意到了

translation.en: Yeah! Yeah. She got two of 'em, don't she?
translation.zh: 是啊，她有一双眼睛吧？

translation.en: I think one of them's glass. Yeah, which one is that?
translation.zh: -我想其中一只是玻璃的-哪一只？

translation.en: Is that the right one or the left one? The brown one. Hey!
translation.zh: -右边的还是左边的？-棕色的那只

translation.en: Cole, don't make me tell the whole town about that time you screwed that fella in Atlanta.
translation.zh: 别让我告诉全镇你在亚特兰大睡过的那人

translation.en: Ooh. You talkin' to me?
translation.zh: 说我吗？

translation.en: You mean that dance hall girl at Bunny's? Yeah.
translation.zh: -那个在邦尼家跳舞的那个女生？-是啊

translation.en: Sadie was a beautiful woman. Sadie was not a man.
translation.zh: 萨迪是个美丽的女人不是男人！

translation.en: She had a mustache. Nice mustache. She had more than a mustache.
translation.zh: -她有胡子，胡子长得不错-她可不止有胡子

translation.en: Well, she-she was European.
translation.zh: -她是欧洲人-好吧

translation.en: Ah, all right, I'll admit Sadie was a woman
translation.zh: -她是欧洲人-好吧 如果你不说我的齐我就承认萨迪是女的

translation.en: if you just stop sayin' things about my Zee.
translation.zh: 如果你不说我的齐我就承认萨迪是女的

translation.en: "My Zee"? Your Zee?
translation.zh: -“我的齐”？-你的齐？

translation.en: Yeah. Oh. "From women's eyes, this doctrine I derive.
translation.zh: 女子的明眸让我明白了这个道理

translation.en: "They sparkle still, the right Promethean fire.
translation.zh: 它们闪烁着普罗米修斯之火

translation.en: "They are the books, the arts, the academes..
translation.zh: 她们是书籍、艺术与学院

translation.en: ...that show, contain and nourish all the world."
translation.zh: 展现、包容和滋润着全世界

translation.en: Well, I don't know what it is you just said,
translation.zh: 展现、包容和滋润着全世界 不知道你在说什么，不过很动听

translation.en: but it sounded real nice.
translation.zh: 不知道你在说什么，不过很动听

translation.en: That's Shakespeare. Now, he's European.
translation.zh: 是莎士比亚说的他也是欧洲人

translation.en: Wanna write that down for me, Frank? So I can say it to Zee?
translation.zh: 可以把它写下来我说给齐听吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I'll send you a telegram. Thanks, brother.
translation.zh: -我给你发个电报过来-谢了，兄弟

translation.en: Thanks for the help, Cole. Well, you did plenty over at our place.
translation.zh: -谢谢你的帮忙，科尔-你在我们这里干了很多活

translation.en: You miss it, don't you? JESSE: The war? COLE: Yeah.
translation.zh: -你想它，是吗？-什么，战争？

translation.en: Hell, no.
translation.zh: 绝对不会

translation.en: There are things I miss about it, but...
translation.zh: 我想和它有关的事，但是…

translation.en: You know, it was exciting. Yeah.
translation.zh: -很刺激-对

translation.en: But it was a whole lot of killing and why should we miss that?
translation.zh: 太多的残杀为什么要想？

translation.en: COLE: Well, 'cause we were good at it. Shoot, we were great at it.
translation.zh: 因为我们很拿手射击，我们很擅长

translation.en: If you tell anybody I said this, I have to kill you 'cause everybody knows that I'm the toughest man in this town.
translation.zh: 如果告诉别人我就杀了你你知道我是镇上最强悍的

translation.en: But you are one terrifying son of a bitch with them guns. Yeah, well... [HORSES GALLOPING]
translation.zh: -不过你是个可怕的配枪的杂种-是啊

translation.en: Boys.
translation.zh: 弟兄们

translation.en: Howdy, folks. How are you today?
translation.zh: 伙计们，你们好吗？

translation.en: Howdy. Yeah, easterners.
translation.zh: -你好-东部人

translation.en: We're just fine, thank you, sir.
translation.zh: 很好，谢谢，先生

translation.en: I'm Rollin H. Parker. Personal emissary to Mr. Thaddeus Rains,
translation.zh: 我是罗林·派克石岛铁路公司的主席

translation.en: president of the Rock Northern Railroad.
translation.zh: 迪厄斯·瑞恩斯的特使

translation.en: And this gentleman is the famous Allan Pinkerton.
translation.zh: 这位是艾伦·平克顿

translation.en: Founder of the Secret Service and currently under contract to Mr. Thaddeus Rains.
translation.zh: 和瑞恩斯先生签约的秘密服务公司的创建人

translation.en: As you no doubt heard from your neighbors our railroad is moving West. That makes sense 'cause,
translation.zh: 你们一定听说了我们的铁路要向西部发展

translation.en: see, East would put you underwater.
translation.zh: 所以你在东部就跌价了

translation.en: Moving West opened up the frontier to folks such as yourselves.
translation.zh: 向西部是为人民开拓边疆

translation.en: It just so happens that your acreage here is located on the proposed right of way.
translation.zh: 你们的土地刚好在规划区内

translation.en: I am here... to get your signature on this land sale contract.
translation.zh: 我是来让你们签署这份土地转卖合同的

translation.en: And I'm authorized to pay you
translation.zh: 我授权向你们支付每英亩两美金

translation.en: $2 an acre.
translation.zh: 我授权向你们支付每英亩两美金 两美金？

translation.en: Two dollars? PARKER: That's right.
translation.zh: 两美金？ 价格由美国内政局审查通过

translation.en: That's the price approved by the Department of the Interior of the Government of the United States of America.
translation.zh: 价格由美国内政局审查通过

translation.en: This land ain't for sale. Ma'am, I can understand how you feel.
translation.zh: -这块地不卖-夫人，我能理解你的感受

translation.en: You've made a lovely home here, but it really isn't up to me or you.
translation.zh: 你在这里有舒适的家但这由不得你我做主

translation.en: You familiar with the legal concept
translation.zh: 你了解征用权吗？

translation.en: of right of eminent domain? Yeah, I am. What about it?
translation.zh: 你了解征用权吗？ 是，又怎么样？

translation.en: This land's about to be condemned.
translation.zh: 这土地要被征收了

translation.en: So you see, I'm doing you folks a favor.
translation.zh: 听着，我是来帮你们的

translation.en: The price of $2 an acre is one-time-only deal.
translation.zh: 每英亩两美金是一次性的价格

translation.en: After today, the price goes down.
translation.zh: 过了今天，价格就要跌了

translation.en: So if I were you, I would just sign the contract and we'll be on our way.
translation.zh: 如果换成我我会签了合同离开

translation.en: Good day, Mr. Parker.
translation.zh: 再见，派克先生

translation.en: You can tell Mr. Thaddeus Rains to put this where the sun don't shine.
translation.zh: 你能转告迪厄斯·瑞恩斯先生把这个放到永无天日的地方

translation.en: Shakespeare.
translation.zh: 莎士比亚

translation.en: I don't think you understand.
translation.zh: 我想你们不明白

translation.en: You don't have a choice.
translation.zh: 你们无法选择

translation.en: Ma'am, I think that you should search your heart here
translation.zh: 女士，我想你应该仔细考虑一下

translation.en: and try to do the right thing.
translation.zh: 做出正确的选择

translation.en: Let me ask the Lord.
translation.zh: 让我问问主

translation.en: The Lord says we can bury 'em out back in the orchard. Nobody'll ever find 'em.
translation.zh: 主说可以把他们埋了没人会找到他们

translation.en: Somebody's in a vengeful mood today. Why don't we let 'em go for today, Ma?
translation.zh: -有人今天报复心重-放他们一马吧，妈

translation.en: We'll bury 'em out back next time. MA: Oh, all right.
translation.zh: -我们下次再埋他们-哦，好吧

translation.en: Now, ma'am-- [GUN COCKING]
translation.zh: 夫人…

translation.en: You folks are making a serious mistake here.
translation.zh: 你们犯了个严重的错误

translation.en: Nicely played.
translation.zh: 做得漂亮

translation.en: Tell all the folks what you told me, Frank.
translation.zh: 把你对我说的都告诉他们

translation.en: Well, I went to the courthouse to look at the right-of-way documents for the rail bed. The railroad doesn't even need our land.
translation.zh: 我看了法院有关修建铁路的文件他们不需要我们的土地

translation.en: They're just using our land on both sides for as far as the camp.
translation.zh: 他们想尽可能多的霸占我们的土地

translation.en: Uh, floor recognizes Clell Miller.
translation.zh: 克莱·米勒发言

translation.en: They're sayin' if we don't sell we might end up with nothing.
translation.zh: 他们说如果我们不卖最后将一无所获

translation.en: That's only if we don't stick together. Loni Packwood.
translation.zh: -除非我们不团结-朗尼·帕克伍德

translation.en: I say this is the last straw.
translation.zh: 我认为这让人忍无可忍

translation.en: I came back from the war. My farm was burned down.
translation.zh: 我从战场回来我的农场被烧毁了

translation.en: My cows was dead. And now my wife's run off with my cousin Jeb.
translation.zh: 我的奶牛都死了现在老婆跟我的表兄杰布跑了

translation.en: That son of a bitch. He took my dog!
translation.zh: 那个该死的他还带走了我的狗！

translation.en: DOC MIMMS: Uh, Loni, about the railroad.
translation.zh: 朗尼，说铁路的事

translation.en: He took my dog!
translation.zh: 他把我的狗带走了！

translation.en: MAN: They got Cole! ZEE: Daddy, he came to our house.
translation.zh: -他们把科尔抓走了！-他来我们的家

translation.en: You'd all want to hear this.
translation.zh: 你们都会想听听

translation.en: They came up. They made the same offer they made you folks.
translation.zh: 他们来了提出了同样的条件

translation.en: Our little brother Jim tried to chase 'em off.
translation.zh: 我的弟弟吉姆想赶他们走

translation.en: One of the detectives hit him in the head and knocked him out.
translation.zh: 一个侦探砸了他的头把他打晕了

translation.en: Cole lost his temper. Oh, no.
translation.zh: -科尔发脾气了-哦，不

translation.en: He just lost his temper a little. How many of them did he kill, Bob?
translation.zh: -只是一点生气-他杀了几个，鲍伯？

translation.en: Two. Cole.
translation.zh: 两个

translation.en: They said that because the detectives was working for the Department of the Interior--
translation.zh: 因为他们为内政局服务…

translation.en: The army can hang him.
translation.zh: 军队能绞死他

translation.en: Tomorrow. MAN: What do we do?
translation.zh: 就明天 -我们怎么办？-什么都做不了！

translation.en: Nothin'.
translation.zh: -我们怎么办？-什么都做不了！

translation.en: You folks are gonna do nothin'. You're gonna go home right now.
translation.zh: 你们大家什么都帮不了马上回家

translation.en: You too, doc.
translation.zh: 你也是，医生

translation.en: So you can swear on a Bible that you don't know anything about what's gonna happen tomorrow.
translation.zh: 这样你们可以发誓说对明天要发生的事毫不知情

translation.en: Boys-- Doc! Go home.
translation.zh: -孩子们…-医生，回家

translation.en: They ain't gonna hang no more Liberty Boys.
translation.zh: 他们不会再吊死自由镇的人了

translation.en: Go home.
translation.zh: 回家

translation.en: Meeting's adjourned. Go home, everybody.
translation.zh: 休会，大家回家吧

translation.en: Go home.
translation.zh: 回家

translation.en: I'm staying. Me too.
translation.zh: -我留下-我也是

translation.en: Loni, Clell.
translation.zh: 朗尼，克莱

translation.en: I couldn't lose him. Ah, Jim Younger!
translation.zh: -不能失去他-吉姆，我叫你待在家里的！

translation.en: I told you to stay home! It's my fault
translation.zh: -不能失去他-吉姆，我叫你待在家里的！ 是我的错，我要参加

translation.en: they're gonna kill Cole. I want in.
translation.zh: 是我的错，我要参加

translation.en: Jim, it was a matter of time before they tried to hang somebody to scare off the farmers.
translation.zh: 他们随时都会再绞死个人，杀鸡儆猴

translation.en: And you're too young. Too young?
translation.zh: -你太年轻了-太年轻？

translation.en: I'm the same age you were when you went to war. Yeah, and the same age Web was. No.
translation.zh: -你参战时就我现在这年纪-对，韦伯也一样，不行

translation.en: You're wasting time. Zee, go home.
translation.zh: -你们在浪费时间-齐，回家

translation.en: Who else was there when they hanged the others?
translation.zh: 他们施行绞刑的时候还有谁在场？

translation.en: You need to know how they do it, which way they walk up, what order they do things in.
translation.zh: 你得知道他们如何执行从哪里走，程序怎样

translation.en: And if you mess up rescuing Cole because you won't listen to a woman...
translation.zh: 如果你们因为不听一个女人的话而错过搭救科尔的机会…

translation.en: then damn you all.
translation.zh: 如果你们因为不听一个女人的话而错过搭救科尔的机会… 那你们全都该死

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Eight of us against a Union regiment
translation.zh: 我们八人要在光天化日之下…

translation.en: and Pinkerton detectives in the middle of Main Street in broad daylight.
translation.zh: 在主街对抗联邦军和平克顿侦探

translation.en: He's smilin'. Is that bad?
translation.zh: -他在笑-那不好吗？

translation.en: Very.
translation.zh: 很不好

translation.en: Pinkerton, relax. The army has everything well in hand.
translation.zh: 平克顿，放松一切尽在军队的掌控之中

translation.en: Nothin' like a hanging to motivate the population to relocate.
translation.zh: 没什么比绞刑更能让人们举家迁移的了

translation.en: It's not my job to relax.
translation.zh: 我的工作不是放松

translation.en: I've got men positioned at every entrance to this square so no one will ride in shooting.
translation.zh: 我派人看住了每个入口没人能在这里骑马射击

translation.en: And I've got a sharpshooter up on that rooftop over there.
translation.zh: 在那屋顶上我安排了一位狙击手

translation.en: Just in case.
translation.zh: 以防万一

translation.en: MAN: Be it known that Coleman Younger be found guilty of treasonable acts
translation.zh: 科尔曼·扬格因为叛国行为

translation.en: against military law and the articles of war
translation.zh: 违反军事法和战争条款被判决有罪

translation.en: to be hanged this day by the neck until dead.
translation.zh: 绞首直至死亡

translation.en: May God have mercy on his soul.
translation.zh: 愿上帝怜悯他的灵魂

translation.en: Brilliant.
translation.zh: 真绝

translation.en: Hang him! Pull it! Pull it!
translation.zh: 快，吊死他！拉！

translation.en: MAN 1: Sir, are you all right? MAN 2: Somebody get a doctor!
translation.zh: 先生，你没事吧？快叫医生

translation.en: The bullet came out clean but he's lost an awful lot of blood.
translation.zh: 子弹取干净了但是他失血很多

translation.en: He is gonna be fine, right, daddy?
translation.zh: 他不会有事吧，爸爸？

translation.en: Praying wouldn't hurt.
translation.zh: 祈祷吧

translation.en: Who's that? Stay here with him.
translation.zh: 那是谁？在这里陪他

translation.en: Sir, we're looking for a fugitive. We're checking all the houses in the area.
translation.zh: 我们在逐屋搜查一个逃犯

translation.en: Powell, out back. McCall, check the first floor.
translation.zh: 鲍威尔，后院麦科，一楼

translation.en: I'm goin' up. Sir, who are you?
translation.zh: -我上楼-你是谁？

translation.en: Oh, sorry, ma'am. Well, I should hope so!
translation.zh: -哦，抱歉，女士-我希望如此

translation.en: Go! Go.
translation.zh: 滚！滚

translation.en: Jesse, are you awake?
translation.zh: 杰西，你醒着吗？

translation.en: Jesse, is that your hand? Mm.
translation.zh: 杰西，那是你的手吗？

translation.en: They're gone. What are you...?
translation.zh: 他们走了，你在…？

translation.en: I fooled them into thinking I was alone. Let's hope the boy pulls through.
translation.zh: -我让他们以为我一个人-希望他能挺住

translation.en: I think he's feeling better already.
translation.zh: 我想他已经感觉好多了

translation.en: PARKER: Mr. Thaddeus Rains, sir.
translation.zh: 迪厄斯·瑞恩斯先生，阁下

translation.en: It's a pleasure to have you join us in the field.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你-我很荣幸来此

translation.en: Well, I'm pleased to be here. Really?
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你-我很荣幸来此 -真的？-不，派克，不是！

translation.en: No, Parker, no.
translation.zh: -真的？-不，派克，不是！

translation.en: I'm really not pleased to leave my boardroom
translation.zh: 我真的很不愿意来如此一个尘土飞扬的地方…

translation.en: come to this godforsaken piece of dirt to discover
translation.zh: 我真的很不愿意来如此一个尘土飞扬的地方… 发现你都无法把几个微不足道的农民

translation.en: why in the name of all that's holy
translation.zh: 发现你都无法把几个微不足道的农民

translation.en: you can't seem to evict a few simple farmers
translation.zh: 发现你都无法把几个微不足道的农民 从他们的土洞里驱逐出去

translation.en: from their pathetic little mud holes...
translation.zh: 从他们的土洞里驱逐出去

translation.en: so that I can build the greatest railroad the world has ever seen.
translation.zh: 障碍我修建有史以来最伟大的铁路

translation.en: Well, I completely understand your distress, sir. What's going on?
translation.zh: -您的苦恼我明白，先生-发生了什么事？

translation.en: Well, sir.. Two weeks ago we managed to arrange to have the army hang one of the local farmers.
translation.zh: 两周前，我们准备让军队绞死一个当地农民

translation.en: That's good. No, unfortunately not, sir.
translation.zh: -那很好-很不幸不好，先生

translation.en: Uh, a group of local thugs managed to rescue him from the gallows.
translation.zh: 一帮当地的暴徒把他救走了

translation.en: Not only did this inspire resistance in the other farmers, but the redoubtable Mr. Allan Pinkerton was seriously injured in the incident.
translation.zh: 还激起了反抗艾伦·平克顿先生受了重伤

translation.en: Leaving you in charge of operations until he should return.
translation.zh: 他回来之前这里由你来负责

translation.en: A further impediment is that the Army Garrison has been ordered to move on away from Liberty
translation.zh: 更麻烦的是部队要撤了

translation.en: so we no longer have that particular stick with which to threaten the farmers.
translation.zh: 因此我们就没有什么可以来制约他们

translation.en: You see the Army leaving, you see the loss of a tool.
translation.zh: 你只看到失去了靠山

translation.en: I see a power vacuum to be filled. As we have the most power,
translation.zh: 我看到的是权利的真空需要填补，只要我们掌权…

translation.en: we may move with impunity.
translation.zh: 我们就能所向无敌

translation.en: I see, sir.
translation.zh: 明白了，先生

translation.en: I'll get together four patrols of our detectives for action tonight.
translation.zh: 我将派四个巡逻队今晚一起行动

translation.en: We'll teach these podunks what happens
translation.zh: 让他们尝尝…

translation.en: when they challenge the righteousness of progress.
translation.zh: 挑战进步的正义的后果

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 是，先生

translation.en: Jesse, you shouldn't be up. Oh, I've been on my back two weeks, Zee. I'm sick of it.
translation.zh: 你不该起来已经两周了，我都躺腻了

translation.en: You sick of my company? No, course not, Zee.
translation.zh: -你难道厌倦我的陪伴了？-当然不是！

translation.en: Teasing you's completely unfair. What you do to me is unfair.
translation.zh: 不该开你的玩笑你对我做的不公平

translation.en: Well, I shouldn't tease a hero. A what?
translation.zh: -我不该开一个英雄的玩笑-什么？

translation.en: Everybody in the county knows it was you who rescued Cole.
translation.zh: 全镇的人都知道是你救了科尔

translation.en: We're all so proud of you, Jesse.
translation.zh: 我们都为你感到骄傲

translation.en: And not a single farm's been sold to the railroad since.
translation.zh: 那之后就没人卖农场了

translation.en: Oh, that's good. But I wasn't the only person
translation.zh: 那很好但是那天冒绞刑之险的…

translation.en: risking my neck that day, so..
translation.zh: 不仅是我一个人

translation.en: So what you're saying then is that
translation.zh: 不仅是我一个人 你是说我应该和科尔·扬格在一起？

translation.en: I should go and spend time with Cole Younger?
translation.zh: 你是说我应该和科尔·扬格在一起？

translation.en: With Cole Younger? No, I never said that.
translation.zh: 和科尔·扬格？不，我没这个意思

translation.en: You gonna stop loafin' around with that young lady and get back to the farm? What do you think, Frank?
translation.zh: -你别再游荡了，回家好吗？-你说呢，弗兰克？

translation.en: You get in the wagon! Until Ma has you home so she can fuss over you herself she's gonna make me miserable.
translation.zh: 等你回了家，妈妈就不再会大惊小怪的折磨我了

translation.en: What do you say, sir? Go ahead. You're pretty much all healed up.
translation.zh: -你说呢，先生？-你恢复得很好了

translation.en: Thank you, doc. Of course.
translation.zh: -谢谢，医生-别客气

translation.en: Bye, Jesse.
translation.zh: 再见，杰西

translation.en: Bye, Zee.
translation.zh: 再见，齐

translation.en: You're lookin' a bit more spry. Shut up, Frank.
translation.zh: -你看起来更加敏捷了-闭嘴，弗兰克

translation.en: Doc? I was wonderin' if, uh, later this evenin' I could come by.
translation.zh: 医生，我想今晚晚些时候能否过来？

translation.en: You're always welcome here, Jess.
translation.zh: 随时欢迎你

translation.en: Yeah, I know, doc, but, well, I was thinkin' maybe I could come by and take Zee out.
translation.zh: 我知道，医生但我是想约齐出去？

translation.en: You know, someplace near, with other folk.
translation.zh: 就在附近和一些朋友一起

translation.en: Near, you know, here, but, ahem, out.
translation.zh: 附近，你知道这里，但在外面

translation.en: That's fine by me, Jesse. Oh, don't worry, sir.
translation.zh: 我没问题，杰西 别担心，先生我会保证他们有人监护的

translation.en: I'll make sure they're properly chaperoned.
translation.zh: 别担心，先生我会保证他们有人监护的

translation.en: DOC MIMMS: Well, that hadn't even occurred to me, Frank. I am deeply in your debt.
translation.zh: 我连想都没想过，多谢了

translation.en: Well, you are very welcome, sir.
translation.zh: 不用客气，先生

translation.en: Oh, by the way, the Army's leaving town so Cole can stop hidin' up in the woods
translation.zh: 军队要撤离了，科尔不用躲藏可以回他的农场去了

translation.en: and get back to his farm. We're all gonna meet
translation.zh: 军队要撤离了，科尔不用躲藏可以回他的农场去了 我们都要去扬格的家庆祝一下

translation.en: at the Younger place for a shindig.
translation.zh: 我们都要去扬格的家庆祝一下

translation.en: Hey, you leave them alone. Leave 'em alone.
translation.zh: -别缠着她们-嘿

translation.en: Cole. Clell.
translation.zh: -别缠着她们-科尔 -克莱-你好吗？

translation.en: How are ya? Okay, hey, John. How are you, Cole?
translation.zh: -嘿，约翰-你好啊，科尔

translation.en: Good to see you. Thanks for comin'.
translation.zh: 谢谢你能来

translation.en: Hey, how are ya? Hey, Cole Younger.
translation.zh: -你好吗？-嘿，科尔 嘿，朗尼·帕克…谁见过朗尼·帕克伍德衣冠楚楚？

translation.en: Loni Pack-- Hey, who's seen Loni Packwood? How he's dressed? Look at that!
translation.zh: 嘿，朗尼·帕克…谁见过朗尼·帕克伍德衣冠楚楚？

translation.en: Tom. Come here, huh?
translation.zh: 汤姆，过来

translation.en: Thank you. Look, James.
translation.zh: -谢谢-詹姆斯！

translation.en: You behave yourselves, you hear?
translation.zh: 你们管好自己

translation.en: Hey, look. Liberty's favorite son. Come here! Hi, Cole.
translation.zh: 看，自由镇最受欢迎的孩子，过来！

translation.en: I'll never forget what you did, cousin.
translation.zh: -我不会忘了你的救命之恩-还不能忘

translation.en: You know it? Yeah. Zee, I'm pleased you came.
translation.zh: 齐，很高兴你能来

translation.en: Oh, why, thank you, Bob. I'm especially pleased you came with Jesse.
translation.zh: -是嘛，谢谢-我很高兴你和杰西一起来了

translation.en: Seeing as right now there's a gaggle of girls over there hopin' to dance with Jesse
translation.zh: 很多女孩想和杰西跳舞…

translation.en: who are just gonna have to settle with the many charms of Bob Younger.
translation.zh: 不过现在要用我的魅力来搞定她们

translation.en: Oh, Bob, you have no shame. Not yet. But I'm hopin'.
translation.zh: -鲍伯，你脸皮真厚-还太早，希望如此

translation.en: Come on, let's dance. Okay.
translation.zh: -我们跳舞吧-好

translation.en: I used to come to this rock all the time
translation.zh: 我儿时常来这块岩石上

translation.en: when I was a kid. Just imaginin' what my life
translation.zh: 我儿时常来这块岩石上 想像我长大后生活会怎样

translation.en: would be like when I got older.
translation.zh: 想像我长大后生活会怎样

translation.en: You didn't want a farm? Nah. I was thinkin' more along the lines
translation.zh: -你不想要农场吗？-我想做个河上的劫匪

translation.en: of being a river pirate. A river pirate?
translation.zh: -你不想要农场吗？-我想做个河上的劫匪 -一个劫匪？-对

translation.en: Yeah. Argh. Hand over your jewels, missy! Well, thank God you grew out of that.
translation.zh: -把你的珠宝交出来，小妞-谢天谢地，你长大就放弃了

translation.en: You did grow out of that, didn't you? Mostly, yeah.
translation.zh: -你放弃那想法了吧？-差不多，是的

translation.en: I mean, it would be an all right life for a bachelor.
translation.zh: 如果是单身汉就不是问题

translation.en: A-are you plannin' on bein' a bachelor your whole life, Jesse James?
translation.zh: 杰西·詹姆斯你想一辈子单身吗？

translation.en: Not if I find the right girl.
translation.zh: 如果找到合适的女孩就不想了

translation.en: What's this right girl like?
translation.zh: 你心目中的女孩是什么样的？

translation.en: What's she like? She's, uh, she's smart.
translation.zh: 她什么样？她既聪慧又有趣

translation.en: She's funny. She's bossy.
translation.zh: 她什么样？她既聪慧又有趣 有点强悍总是让我觉得

translation.en: She always makes me think she's at least two steps ahead of me.
translation.zh: 有点强悍总是让我觉得 她比我更优秀

translation.en: [CHUCKLING] Where will you find such a girl?
translation.zh: 你能在哪里找到这样的女孩？

translation.en: "From this doctrine."
translation.zh: 这个道理…

translation.en: "From women's eyes these doctrine-- This doctrine I derive."
translation.zh: 女子的明眸让我明白了这个道理

translation.en: They sparkle... still, like...
translation.zh: 它们闪烁着…

translation.en: tiny sparkling rocks.
translation.zh: 细小的灿烂的石头

translation.en: Darn it. "Sparkling rocks"?
translation.zh: 细小的灿烂的石头 “灿烂的石头”？

translation.en: Yeah, little ones, see.
translation.zh: 是的， 细小的

translation.en: Is this one of Frank's Shakespeare poems
translation.zh: 你想引用弗兰克说的莎士比亚的诗吗？

translation.en: you're trying to quote? Yes, it is.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Were, um.. Were you planning on kissing me when you finished quoting?
translation.zh: 等你引用完会亲我吗？

translation.en: Been planning on kissing you for a very long time.
translation.zh: 我想吻你想了好久了

translation.en: Bastards! Come back here and face me!
translation.zh: 混蛋！ 回来看我怎么收拾你们！

translation.en: No, Jimmy! Cole, what'd they do?
translation.zh: -科尔，怎么了？-我们回去

translation.en: Come on. Let's get back. We need some water.
translation.zh: -科尔，怎么了？-我们回去 我们需要些水，拿桶来

translation.en: Come on, let's get some buckets.
translation.zh: 我们需要些水，拿桶来

translation.en: Get buckets! Water!
translation.zh: 拿桶来！水！

translation.en: It's the Pinkertons. It's the Railroad.
translation.zh: 是平克顿的人，铁路的人

translation.en: Then Ma... Ma!
translation.zh: 那妈妈，妈妈！

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 快！

translation.en: Thank God.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地

translation.en: Ma!
translation.zh: 妈妈！

translation.en: Ma! Ma!
translation.zh: 妈妈！妈妈！

translation.en: Hang on, Ma. We gotta get you to Doc Mimms'.
translation.zh: 顶住，我们送你去明斯医生那里

translation.en: You boys... take care. Take care of each other.
translation.zh: 你们兄弟要互相照顾

translation.en: Ma, Doc Mimms-- Shh!
translation.zh: 妈妈，明斯医生…

translation.en: Well, look at that.
translation.zh: 看啊

translation.en: The good Lord's a bit shorter than I reckoned.
translation.zh: 万能的主比我想象的要矮

translation.en: Ma.
translation.zh: 妈妈？

translation.en: I think we can move on. Rebuild. Make a decent life someplace else.
translation.zh: 我想我们可以搬家，重建在别的地方过上好日子

translation.en: I don't care. I didn't think you would.
translation.zh: -我不在乎-我想你也不会！

translation.en: Our place. Clell Miller's. Sammy Johnston, The Creeders, Will Hite.
translation.zh: 我们的家、米勒的、山米·约翰顿的克里德的，还有威尔·海特的

translation.en: The sheriff said it was a gang of drunk Kansas boys. I say we ride into town and we kill us some Pinkertons
translation.zh: -镇上警长说是堪萨斯的醉鬼干的-我说我们杀些铁路公司的家伙

translation.en: and Railroad men. No. This isn't a feud. This is war.
translation.zh: 不，这不是报仇，这是战争

translation.en: They've got more men than we do. So what do we do, General Lee?
translation.zh: -他们的人比我们多-我们该怎么办？

translation.en: We do what we did in the war. We harass their supply lines.
translation.zh: 就像我们以前在战场上做的扰乱他们的补给线

translation.en: We try and kill the Railroad's men, they won't care. But if we take away their money and supplies...
translation.zh: -杀他们的人，他们不会在乎-如果我们抢走钱和供给…

translation.en: Exactly. That's a good plan, Jesse.
translation.zh: -没错-好主意，杰西

translation.en: BOB: I'll get us a few more men.
translation.zh: 我去多找些人汤姆会和我们一起去

translation.en: Comanche Tom will ride with us. What do we hit first?
translation.zh: 我去多找些人汤姆会和我们一起去 -我们先攻击哪里？-我认识一个在银行工作的女生

translation.en: COLE: I know a gal down at the bank.
translation.zh: -我们先攻击哪里？-我认识一个在银行工作的女生

translation.en: See if she can get me a list of the towns where the Railroad's keepin' its money.
translation.zh: 看我能否搞到一份铁路公司存钱的名单

translation.en: I'm so sorry, Jesse. Me and Frank have to go away for a while.
translation.zh: -我非常遗憾，杰西-我和弗兰克要离开一段时间

translation.en: But you and I... we've started something, you know?
translation.zh: 但是我和你已经有了开始

translation.en: I don't know what'll happen if you do this.
translation.zh: 如果你走了我不知道会发生什么

translation.en: Neither do I. Just let the law--
translation.zh: -我也不知道-就让法律…

translation.en: Laws don't touch men like Thaddeus Rains.
translation.zh: 法律不会管迪厄斯·瑞恩斯这种人的只有正义能做到

translation.en: Only justice does. Whose justice, yours or God's?
translation.zh: 法律不会管迪厄斯·瑞恩斯这种人的只有正义能做到 谁的正义，你的还是上帝的？

translation.en: When will you stop?
translation.zh: 你什么时候才可以停止？

translation.en: When I send them to their graves.
translation.zh: 等我把他们送入坟地

translation.en: MAN 1: Thank you very much. MAN 2: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢，非常感谢

translation.en: Excuse me, ladies and gentlemen. I have bad news. The railroad payroll has been stolen.
translation.zh: 女士们先生们，我有坏消息铁路公司的薪水被偷了

translation.en: MAN: What're you talking about? The railroad's money is right there in that safe.
translation.zh: 什么意思？铁路公司的钱就在那保险箱里

translation.en: [GUNS COCKING] That safe?
translation.zh: 那个保险箱？

translation.en: Excuse me, sir.
translation.zh: 抱歉，先生银行今天关门

translation.en: The bank's closed today. What?
translation.zh: 抱歉，先生银行今天关门 什么？是银行休假日

translation.en: Uh, it's a bank holiday and the bank's closed.
translation.zh: 什么？是银行休假日 他们从来没什么休假日给我闪开！

translation.en: There ain't no dadburned bank holiday! Get out of my way! Ow! Hey!
translation.zh: 他们从来没什么休假日给我闪开！

translation.en: This is outrageous. Who are you people? The James Gang.
translation.zh: 真无耻，你们是谁？詹姆斯帮

translation.en: "The James Gang?" Yeah.
translation.zh: -詹姆斯帮？-是的

translation.en: How about the, uh, James-Younger Gang?
translation.zh: 詹姆斯扬格帮如何？

translation.en: The James-Younger Gang!
translation.zh: 詹姆斯扬格帮

translation.en: I'll whop you real good now if you don't get out-- Sir, the bank is closed. I gotta get to the bank.
translation.zh: 如果你不给我滚开我就狠狠教训你一顿

translation.en: JIM: Ow! Stop! MAN: I'll show you "ow"!
translation.zh: -住手！-我会打得更重

translation.en: Excuse me, sir? It's a bank holiday.
translation.zh: 抱歉，先生今天是银行休假日

translation.en: Ain't no dadburned bank holiday! What're you talkin' about?
translation.zh: 根本没什么银行休假日你在说什么？

translation.en: Mister! What the hell are you doing, mister?
translation.zh: 你想干嘛？滚开

translation.en: JESSE: Sir, the safe.
translation.zh: 先生，保险箱

translation.en: Ma'am, do me a favor.
translation.zh: 先生，保险箱 -女士，转个身，遮住你的眼睛-为什么？

translation.en: Turn around, cover your eyes. Why?
translation.zh: -女士，转个身，遮住你的眼睛-为什么？

translation.en: I'm gonna shoot this man. I don't think you want to see it. Thank you.
translation.zh: 我要杀了他你应该不想看吧，谢谢

translation.en: Hey. The safe.
translation.zh: 嘿，保险箱，快

translation.en: Now!
translation.zh: 嘿，保险箱，快 根本没假日

translation.en: It ain't no bank holiday! It's a bank holiday!
translation.zh: 根本没假日 -是银行休假日-你说的对，先生

translation.en: It ain't! You're right, sir.
translation.zh: -是银行休假日-你说的对，先生

translation.en: Well, then why can't I go in there? On account of that we're, uh, robbing it.
translation.zh: -那为什么我不能进去？-因为我们在打劫银行

translation.en: MAN: Oh, why didn't you just say so in the first place?
translation.zh: 你为什么不早说？

translation.en: It's a secret. Oh!
translation.zh: 是秘密

translation.en: Fine. Uh, I'll-- I'll just wait over here. I'd appreciate that.
translation.zh: -好吧，我在这里等-不胜感激

translation.en: Go on! Get outta here.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: What the...? What is it?
translation.zh: -怎么…？-什么事？

translation.en: Old Man Tucker is just sittin' there quiet outside the bank.
translation.zh: 老塔克居然安静地坐在银行外面

translation.en: MAN: So?
translation.zh: 那又怎么样？

translation.en: So when have you ever known Old Man Tucker not to be yellin' at everybody?
translation.zh: 你何时见过老塔特不嚷嚷的？

translation.en: How'd it go in there? Fine. How'd it go out here?
translation.zh: -里面怎么样？-很好，外面呢？

translation.en: I think we should talk.
translation.zh: 我们应该谈谈

translation.en: Sir, you can do this the smart way or the stupid way. Only one way ends with you still breathin'.
translation.zh: 你可以选择放聪明或做愚事只有一种能让你活下来

translation.en: Just 'cause we're robbin' a bank, there's no reason not to be civil about it.
translation.zh: 虽然我们在抢劫银行但没理由不文明

translation.en: Where the hell were you? I had you covered.
translation.zh: -你去哪里了？-我在掩护你

translation.en: I got 5,000. I got three.
translation.zh: -我拿到五千-我拿到三千

translation.en: Eight thousand dollars! That's a thousand apiece!
translation.zh: 八千美金！每人可以分到一千

translation.en: Our luck is finally changing.
translation.zh: 我们终于转运了

translation.en: Now, what do we do with these? These are the property rights to the farms that the bank was holdin' for the railroad.
translation.zh: 这些是银行为铁路公司保管的农场产权

translation.en: You better pass them over here before somethin' happens to 'em.
translation.zh: 在它们有什么闪失前最好递过来

translation.en: Whoops.
translation.zh: 哎呀

translation.en: All right. Settle down. Not all this money's ours.
translation.zh: 安静，钱并不全是我们的

translation.en: BOB: Uh, well, no, Jesse, it was the bank's.
translation.zh: 不，杰西，这是银行的

translation.en: See, that's why we had to go to all the trouble of stealing it.
translation.zh: 所以我们才花那么大劲去抢

translation.en: Look, we oughta take some of this money, give it to our neighbors in Liberty. There's a lot of people hurtin' there.
translation.zh: 我们应该把一些钱分给自由镇受损的邻居们

translation.en: Hey, none of them risked their necks for this.
translation.zh: 他们没有冒被绞死的危险

translation.en: Let's think about this. We create some goodwill with the folk hereabout, make it easier to dodge the law.
translation.zh: 做些善事就更容易逃脱法律的制裁

translation.en: See, Frank's being smart about this.
translation.zh: -弗兰克想的很明智-不

translation.en: Well, no, just because he reads all them books
translation.zh: -弗兰克想的很明智-不 他读书，会说那些冠冕堂皇的话并不代表他聪明

translation.en: and he knows them big words, don't make him smart.
translation.zh: 他读书，会说那些冠冕堂皇的话并不代表他聪明

translation.en: Uh, yeah, it does. No, it don't, Bob. Stay out of this.
translation.zh: -有帮助-没有，别说了

translation.en: Look, I think Jesse's got a good idea. Jim?
translation.zh: -我想杰西的主意很好-吉姆

translation.en: Who put you in charge of this gang, Jesse, huh? I did a mighty fine job leadin' us durin' the war.
translation.zh: 谁让你当头的？在战争中我可是头

translation.en: Yeah, you did, Cole. And I remember cuttin' a noose from your neck.
translation.zh: 我记得是我砍掉了你的绞索

translation.en: That's why you both lead the gang.
translation.zh: 所以你们两个都是头

translation.en: Two of you entered that bank together, right? Two heads are better than one.
translation.zh: 你们两个一起进的银行两个头比一个好

translation.en: All Jesse's doin' is makin' a suggestion.
translation.zh: 杰西只是提了个建议

translation.en: So we're waitin' to hear what you think of that suggestion,
translation.zh: 我们想听听你的看法，科尔

translation.en: Cole, as the other leader of the gang.
translation.zh: 我们想听听你的看法，科尔 作为帮里的另一个头

translation.en: That's fine. FRANK: What's that?
translation.zh: 很好 -什么？-那是明智之举

translation.en: I said I reckon it's a smart thing to do.
translation.zh: -什么？-那是明智之举

translation.en: Cole! Hey, that's it.
translation.zh: -科尔-嘿！ 就这样决定了我们的路还长着呢

translation.en: We decide somethin', that's it. Now, we're in this for the long haul
translation.zh: 就这样决定了我们的路还长着呢

translation.en: and this plan of me and Jesse's... smart, help us, give us places to hide.
translation.zh: 我和杰西的计划很英明可以为我们找到藏身之处

translation.en: We don't have to worry about a farmer with a shotgun shootin' us in our sleep.
translation.zh: 那样农民们就不会趁我们睡觉时朝我们开枪

translation.en: We got to think. What's that word, Frank?
translation.zh: 我们得考虑…那个词怎么说来着，弗兰克？

translation.en: "Strategically."
translation.zh: -战略性-对，谢谢

translation.en: Yeah. Thank you. Strategically.
translation.zh: -战略性-对，谢谢 -战略性，因为这是场战争-这不是战争

translation.en: 'Cause this is a war. This ain't no war.
translation.zh: -战略性，因为这是场战争-这不是战争

translation.en: What's that?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Nobody paid me no thousand dollars to fight in a war.
translation.zh: 没人会付我一千元去打仗

translation.en: One down. Damn it, Tom. You cheatin' again?
translation.zh: -汤姆，你又作弊啦？-我又输光了

translation.en: I'm broke again. Next up, Thaxton Switch. Yeah, see, that ain't a bank, Jesse.
translation.zh: -下一个，泰斯顿·斯沃齐-那不是银行

translation.en: It is better. I mean, it's a construction depot,
translation.zh: -是个建筑仓库-会有弹药、炸弹

translation.en: so it'll have the strongbox, some ammo, explosives.
translation.zh: -是个建筑仓库-会有弹药、炸弹 我们能拿上这些做更大的事

translation.en: We can take those. That way we can do a bigger job next time.
translation.zh: 我们能拿上这些做更大的事

translation.en: And it's guarded by Pinkerton detectives. And I do so want to kill me some Pinkerton detectives.
translation.zh: -平克顿的探员们看守着-我就想杀了他们

translation.en: Boys!
translation.zh: 弟兄们

translation.en: We're famous. What's this?
translation.zh: -我们出名了-这是什么？

translation.en: "The Fidelity Bank was robbed on Tuesday by a gang of 20 heavily armed men."
translation.zh: “诚信银行周二被二十个武装歹徒抢劫”

translation.en: Twenty? What are the odds?
translation.zh: 二十？好巧，另一帮人在同一天抢劫了同一个银行？

translation.en: Another gang robbin' the same bank on the same day as us.
translation.zh: 二十？好巧，另一帮人在同一天抢劫了同一个银行？ “这帮狂徒自称是詹姆斯扬格帮

translation.en: "The outlaws calling themselves the James-Younger Gang
translation.zh: “这帮狂徒自称是詹姆斯扬格帮

translation.en: "shot their way out of town, wounding the sheriff "and three other townsfolk.
translation.zh: 开枪撤离时打伤了镇上警长和三个镇民

translation.en: The bank officials estimate the loss of $50,000." Fifty thousand dollars? More like 50,000 pesos.
translation.zh: -估计损失五万美金”-五万美金？五万比索还差不多

translation.en: "The U.S. District Marshal at St. Louis called this the first daylight bank robbery in American history."
translation.zh: “这被认为是美国有史以来首次光天化日下的银行抢劫案”

translation.en: Here's to history. I'll drink to that.
translation.zh: -敬载入史册-我得为这干杯

translation.en: We made history? That is something to be proud of. The rest of that's a bunch of horseshit.
translation.zh: -我们创造了历史？我们应该感到骄傲-其它的都是废话

translation.en: Next time we're gonna have to set the record straight ourselves. Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 下次我们得为自己正名

translation.en: Line 'em up!
translation.zh: 把杯子排好

translation.en: Barkeep! Whiskey!
translation.zh: -老板-老板 -威士忌-威士忌

translation.en: They exchanged fire with the Pinkerton guards, wounding several.
translation.zh: 他们与平克顿的人交火…

translation.en: Then they raided the payroll office and blew the track.
translation.zh: 袭击了薪水办公室炸毁了铁路

translation.en: How much did they get from the safe? Thirty five thousand, sir, in coins and currency.
translation.zh: 他们从保险箱里抢走多少？三万五千元现金…

translation.en: Not to mention the added delay of miles of destroyed track.
translation.zh: 外加修补破坏的轨道的损失

translation.en: I'll kill 'em for blowing up my railway.
translation.zh: 炸了我的铁路，我要杀了他们

translation.en: PARKER: To be precise, sir, they didn't actually blow the track.
translation.zh: -他们实际上没有炸我们的轨道-那是谁干的？

translation.en: Then who did? Whoa.
translation.zh: -他们实际上没有炸我们的轨道-那是谁干的？ 我们，我们的人

translation.en: We did. I mean, our men... did.
translation.zh: 我们，我们的人

translation.en: Our workers planted the dynamite, but they were under duress.
translation.zh: 我们的工人放的炸药他们是被迫的

translation.en: Pinkerton, what is going on here?
translation.zh: 平克顿，这里怎么回事？

translation.en: My professional opinion is that you've managed to piss off the wrong bunch of farm boys this time.
translation.zh: 你错惹了一帮乡巴佬

translation.en: Well, they had to be dealt with. By burning down their homes?
translation.zh: -得教训他们一下-烧毁他们的家？

translation.en: You wouldn't have done that?
translation.zh: 你不会这样做吗？

translation.en: Oh, I'd have done that, all right, but I'd have made sure I killed 'em all first.
translation.zh: 我会，但会保证先杀死他们

translation.en: I want them arrested and hanged. Do you think a jury in these parts
translation.zh: -我要把他们都抓来绞死-你觉得这里的陪审团

translation.en: would convict one of their own?
translation.zh: 会定他们的罪吗？我觉得不会

translation.en: Uh-uh. I doubt it. We're beginning
translation.zh: 会定他们的罪吗？我觉得不会 -我们开始了一场有趣的游戏-这不是游戏

translation.en: a very interesting game here, Mr. Rains. This is no game.
translation.zh: -我们开始了一场有趣的游戏-这不是游戏

translation.en: Well, I'm afraid our adversaries don't agree.
translation.zh: 恐怕我们的对手不这么想

translation.en: "Rock Island Pacific Railroad Depot was robbed "just outside of St. Louis, Missouri.
translation.zh: “密苏里圣路易斯附近的罗克岛太平洋铁路仓库遭抢劫”

translation.en: "The brave and daring James-Younger Gang "was heavily outnumbered by Pinkerton detectives,
translation.zh: 平克顿的侦探们在人数上胜于詹姆斯－扬格帮…

translation.en: but the city lawmen were no match for the guns of the West."
translation.zh: 但是他们完全不是西部枪手的对手”

translation.en: Fine piece of writin'.
translation.zh: 文笔很棒

translation.en: "The gang destroyed the Thaxton Switch construction,
translation.zh: “这伙人摧毁了泰斯顿·斯沃齐仓库…

translation.en: "meaning that, for a few months, honest farmers will be able
translation.zh: 意味着农民们可以睡上数月的安稳觉了…

translation.en: "to sleep without fearing the railroad
translation.zh: 意味着农民们可以睡上数月的安稳觉了… 不用再担心铁路公司会来窃取他们的土地”

translation.en: is coming to steal their land." Now, who wrote this?
translation.zh: 不用再担心铁路公司会来窃取他们的土地” 谁写的？我要连续一个月每周二都把他们绞死

translation.en: I'll see 'em hanged every Tuesday for a month.
translation.zh: 谁写的？我要连续一个月每周二都把他们绞死

translation.en: Oh, that's the best part.
translation.zh: 最精彩的还在后头

translation.en: "Foregoing article was sent to this newspaper
translation.zh: “本报上述文章由…

translation.en: was reputedly written by the outlaw Jesse James himself."
translation.zh: “本报上述文章由… 不法分子杰西·詹姆斯亲笔所写”

translation.en: Hey, look at that! What is it?
translation.zh: -嘿，看呀-什么？

translation.en: "Better...
translation.zh: “最好”

translation.en: "slow down.
translation.zh: “减速”

translation.en: "Dynamite "ahead.
translation.zh: “前方有炸药”

translation.en: "Too late.
translation.zh: “太晚了”

translation.en: You're dead!"
translation.zh: “你死定了”

translation.en: Oh!
translation.zh: （炸药）

translation.en: Whoo! Yes, sir! That was a fine piece of driving.
translation.zh: 是的，先生开得很棒

translation.en: Damn!
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: BANK TELLER: Thank you, Mr. Williams. Four more payments
translation.zh: （悬赏五千美金） 谢谢，威廉先生，要付太多款的话你的贷款就会有问题

translation.en: and you'll be caught up on the mortgage.
translation.zh: 谢谢，威廉先生，要付太多款的话你的贷款就会有问题

translation.en: Look carefully at these Yankee two-dollar bills. I've gotten funny ones lately. Good day to you, sir.
translation.zh: 这些北方佬的两美金钞票你得仔细看，我最近收到些很奇怪的

translation.en: Good afternoon, sir. Could you change this for me?
translation.zh: -祝你愉快-能给我换点零钱吗？

translation.en: Certainly, sir. Thank you.
translation.zh: -当然，先生-谢谢

translation.en: [CHUCKLING] Sir, I'm sorry, but this bill is counterfeit. I don't think so. [TELLER WHIMPERING]
translation.zh: -抱歉，这是伪钞-不会吧

translation.en: I'm gonna have to see the rest of your money so I can compare.
translation.zh: 我要拿你所有的钱来对比一下

translation.en: It's a scientific method. I hear it's all the rage. Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 科学方法我听说这很流行

translation.en: Yes, you-- You can compare all of them, Mr.--
translation.zh: 是，你可以全都拿去比较先生…

translation.en: James. Jesse James?
translation.zh: 詹姆斯 -杰西·詹姆斯？-是的，先生，画像画得太差了

translation.en: Yes, sir. It's a terrible sketch.
translation.zh: -杰西·詹姆斯？-是的，先生，画像画得太差了

translation.en: That's-- That's all I have, sir. Well, thank you. It's been a pleasure.
translation.zh: -我只有这些-谢谢，今天很愉快

translation.en: Yes, sir. Take care now, you hear?
translation.zh: -是的-保重，听见了吗？

translation.en: Goodbye, sir. Have a good day. Goodbye.
translation.zh: -再见，先生，祝你今天愉快-再见

translation.en: Pinkerton, why can't you catch these outlaws?
translation.zh: 平克顿，你为什么抓不到这群狂徒？

translation.en: It's early in the game yet, sir.
translation.zh: 我还在努力，先生

translation.en: Jesse James and I are just learning each other's moves,
translation.zh: 我和杰西·詹姆斯在相互揣测… 试探对方

translation.en: feeling out each other's patterns.
translation.zh: 试探对方

translation.en: Oh, well, I'm losing millions of dollars and months of time while you play chess with these farmers.
translation.zh: 你和这些农民下棋时我损失了好几百万了

translation.en: Hardly farmers, sir.
translation.zh: 不是农民那么简单

translation.en: Each one of these men has four years of bloody fightin' experience behind 'em.
translation.zh: 他们中的每个人都有四年的作战经验

translation.en: They are disciplined and have a charismatic leader.
translation.zh: 他们有纪律有具感召力的领导

translation.en: If I were to design the perfect outlaw band,
translation.zh: 如果我要设想一个完美的匪帮…

translation.en: this is the gang I'd create.
translation.zh: 如果我要设想一个完美的匪帮… 这就是我想要的

translation.en: So what can you tell me?
translation.zh: 那么你有什么能说的？

translation.en: It's going to be a long winter.
translation.zh: 这个冬天将会很漫长

translation.en: Take this road. Come on!
translation.zh: 走这边！快！

translation.en: Come on, boys! Come on!
translation.zh: -快！弟兄们！快！-我们跟着！

translation.en: Phew! Never thought that posse was gonna give up. Yeah, they were admirably persistent.
translation.zh: -我从未想过他们会放弃-他们很有耐心

translation.en: That's the longest chase we've had.
translation.zh: 这是最长的一场追逐

translation.en: Jesse, we gotta have a word. Sure, cousin.
translation.zh: -杰西，我们得谈谈-说吧，表哥

translation.en: All the newspapers are calling this bunch the James-Younger Gang.
translation.zh: 报纸称我们詹姆斯扬格帮

translation.en: Right? Yeah.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Why the hell aren't we the Younger-James gang? I mean, we got three Younger brothers and two James brothers.
translation.zh: 为什么不叫“扬格詹姆斯帮”？我们有三个扬格，两个詹姆斯

translation.en: Well, I kinda like the sound of the James-Younger gang.
translation.zh: 我喜欢詹姆斯扬格帮

translation.en: Hey, Jim, I'll beat the piss out of you right now.
translation.zh: 吉姆，我要把你打得屁滚尿流，闭嘴！

translation.en: Now, stay out of this. BOB: Jimmy's got a point, Cole.
translation.zh: 吉姆，我要把你打得屁滚尿流，闭嘴！ 吉姆说得对扬格詹姆斯帮让人困惑

translation.en: The "Younger-James Gang" is confusing.
translation.zh: 吉姆说得对扬格詹姆斯帮让人困惑

translation.en: How's that, Bob? Well...
translation.zh: -怎么样，鲍伯？-如果我们冲进一家银行…

translation.en: say we burst into a bank
translation.zh: -怎么样，鲍伯？-如果我们冲进一家银行… 大叫“我们是扬格詹姆斯帮！”

translation.en: and we yell, "we're the Younger-James Gang!"
translation.zh: 大叫“我们是扬格詹姆斯帮！”

translation.en: People are gonna be thinkin', the Younger-James Gang...
translation.zh: 人们会想“小詹姆斯帮是谁？

translation.en: Is there an Older James Gang? COLE: Hey. BOB: How come we never heard of the Older James gang?
translation.zh: 还有大詹姆斯帮吗？怎么从来没听过？”

translation.en: So people tryin' to figure that out instead of raisin' their arms.
translation.zh: 他们琢磨着就会忘了投降

translation.en: Can't argue with that, Cole. Do we even have the same mama? Huh? Do we?
translation.zh: -无话可说吧，科尔-我们是一个妈生的吗？是吗？

translation.en: Is anybody hearin' me? Huh? See, I got a little idea.
translation.zh: 没人听我的吗？我有个主意

translation.en: If I kill you, then I kill Jim, I'm gonna have no arguments.
translation.zh: 如果我把你杀了，然后把吉米杀了就无异议了

translation.en: Pinkerton? It's been eight months. I see holdups and I see robberies.
translation.zh: 平克顿，已经八个月了我看到的是拖延和抢劫

translation.en: I don't see men on the end of nooses.
translation.zh: 却没有见到有人上绞架

translation.en: Most of these James Gang's encounters, sir, have been with local law enforcement.
translation.zh: 地方执法官与詹姆斯帮交手过

translation.en: Quite frankly are no match for this gang's cunning.
translation.zh: 他们根本不是对手 -那你的探员们呢？-听着，你！闭嘴

translation.en: What about your detectives? Listen, you! Shut up.
translation.zh: -那你的探员们呢？-听着，你！闭嘴

translation.en: I have to hunt this man.
translation.zh: 我必须追捕这个家伙

translation.en: I have to get inside this man's mind.
translation.zh: 我必须进入他的脑子

translation.en: I have to anticipate him.
translation.zh: 我必须预料他要干什么

translation.en: And that takes time. Time, time, time.
translation.zh: 而这些需要时间 时间、时间、时间我不敢相信

translation.en: I can't believe this.
translation.zh: 时间、时间、时间我不敢相信

translation.en: Would you believe there are certain towns in Missouri
translation.zh: 那你会相信在密苏里州的有些镇上 詹姆斯帮像英雄一样自由出入吗？

translation.en: where the James Gang walks openly in the street as heroes.
translation.zh: 詹姆斯帮像英雄一样自由出入吗？ -怎么可能？-因为他们很慷慨

translation.en: PARKER: Now, how can that be? PINKERTON: Because they are charitable.
translation.zh: -怎么可能？-因为他们很慷慨

translation.en: They give money to churches, to farmers.
translation.zh: 把钱给教堂和农民

translation.en: they gave the sharecroppers of Maddox so much money they even built a school.
translation.zh: 他们给玛多斯的佃农足够的钱来建学校

translation.en: That's my money. Well, sir, we should burn that school to the ground.
translation.zh: -那是我的钱！-我们应该烧了那所学校

translation.en: That's the way to win' em back to our side.
translation.zh: 那倒是赢得人心的办法

translation.en: RAINS: Pinkerton, hundreds of men have lost their lives
translation.zh: 平克顿，上百人为了修建这条铁路而送命

translation.en: to build this railroad but they did their jobs.
translation.zh: 平克顿，上百人为了修建这条铁路而送命 但那是他们分内的事

translation.en: Now, this-- This Jesse James,
translation.zh: 现在，这个杰西·詹姆斯是你分内的事

translation.en: that's your job. Do your job.
translation.zh: 现在，这个杰西·詹姆斯是你分内的事 把你分内的事做好

translation.en: Then you let me do my job
translation.zh: 那就让我以自己的方式…

translation.en: as I see fit without interference.
translation.zh: 来解决，别干扰我

translation.en: What can you tell me? It's going to be a long spring.
translation.zh: -你想说什么？-这个春天将会很漫长

translation.en: If people would just hand over their money and not shoot at us, there'd be a lot less killing.
translation.zh: 如果人们不开枪就交出来，就不用杀很多人

translation.en: What's that? It's my lucky rabbit's foot.
translation.zh: -那是什么？-我的幸运兔脚

translation.en: Took it off that dead fellow over there.
translation.zh: -从那个死人身上拿来的-那就说明它不管用

translation.en: I don't think that one's working, Loni.
translation.zh: -从那个死人身上拿来的-那就说明它不管用 什么？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Jesse James! Can I have your autograph?
translation.zh: 杰西·詹姆斯，能给我签名吗？

translation.en: Take us to the West.
translation.zh: 把这个带到西部

translation.en: Lane, Grogan, you take this. You take these towns.
translation.zh: 莱恩，格罗更你们负责这个，负责这些镇

translation.en: You remind me of-- Here, write this. I'm not writing this.
translation.zh: -你让我想起…-我不会写

translation.en: Ahem. Your blue-green eyes remind me of--
translation.zh: 你的蓝绿色的眼睛让我想起…

translation.en: That land in the sky. The land in the sky.
translation.zh: -大地与天空-大地与天空，就是这样

translation.en: That "even here."
translation.zh: 你或许应该改成

translation.en: You might want to change that to, uh, "I thought of you."
translation.zh: 你或许应该改成 -“我思念你”-看，你自己来写吧

translation.en: Ah, look, just write the whole thing yourself. I...
translation.zh: -“我思念你”-看，你自己来写吧

translation.en: Okay, sir, I think we know how this is gonna go.
translation.zh: 我想我们都知道要干什么

translation.en: One false move and I'll blow your head off!
translation.zh: 动错一步，我就打飞你的头！

translation.en: [MAN GASPING] Bob?
translation.zh: -鲍伯？-你听见了，杰西！

translation.en: You heard me, Jesse!
translation.zh: -鲍伯？-你听见了，杰西！ 你知道我有多疯狂！疯狂！

translation.en: You know how crazy I get! Crazy!
translation.zh: 你知道我有多疯狂！疯狂！

translation.en: Bob.
translation.zh: -鲍伯-有问题吗，小弟？

translation.en: We got a problem, little brother?
translation.zh: -鲍伯-有问题吗，小弟？ 坦白的说，有

translation.en: Frankly, yeah. I'm feelin' a little...left out.
translation.zh: 坦白的说，有 -我感觉有点被忽视了-是因为那张通缉海报吗？

translation.en: This is about the wanted posters, isn't it?
translation.zh: -我感觉有点被忽视了-是因为那张通缉海报吗？ 是的，显然有人没有引起大家的注意

translation.en: Yeah, obviously someone's not standin' out in people's minds at the robberies.
translation.zh: 是的，显然有人没有引起大家的注意

translation.en: Gents, we're in the middle of somethin' here.
translation.zh: 先生们，我们正在忙呢 -鲍伯生气了-因为海报？

translation.en: Yeah, Bob's upset. The posters?
translation.zh: -鲍伯生气了-因为海报？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: -是-别用那种语气说话

translation.en: Don't say "yeah" in that tone of voice!
translation.zh: -是-别用那种语气说话 -这很重要！-好

translation.en: This is important! Okay.
translation.zh: -这很重要！-好

translation.en: Pardon the delay, folks, but we had to get
translation.zh: 抱歉耽误你们大家了，但是我们得为疯子鲍伯扬格消消气

translation.en: "Mad" Bob Younger under control.
translation.zh: 抱歉耽误你们大家了，但是我们得为疯子鲍伯扬格消消气 是啊，如果有人打喷嚏鲍伯就会把他杀了

translation.en: Yeah. Bob here'll kill a man for sneezin'.
translation.zh: 是啊，如果有人打喷嚏鲍伯就会把他杀了 -他是我们最棒的神枪手-杰西，比你还好吗？

translation.en: And he's the best shot in the gang.
translation.zh: -他是我们最棒的神枪手-杰西，比你还好吗？

translation.en: Better than you, Jesse? JESSE: Bob Younger... taught me how to shoot.
translation.zh: 鲍伯·扬格教我射击的

translation.en: FRANK: Now...
translation.zh: 现在… 我们继续抢劫如何？

translation.en: how about we get back to the robbery?
translation.zh: 我们继续抢劫如何？

translation.en: Of course. That means now, mister!
translation.zh: -当然-就现在，先生！

translation.en: Now.
translation.zh: 开始吧

translation.en: That's it. No more bets. LONI: One more time. Come on. Talk to me. Oh!
translation.zh: 好啦，别下注了再来一次，拜托，给我看看！

translation.en: Talk to me one more time. Pretty please.
translation.zh: 看啊，再来一次！离手

translation.en: Yeah! Damn, Loni, you're lucky.
translation.zh: -好-见鬼，朗尼，你太幸运了

translation.en: Luckiest man in the West.
translation.zh: 西部最幸运的人…

translation.en: Now that I'm ridin' with Jesse James.
translation.zh: 我和杰西詹姆斯是一伙的！

translation.en: You okay, Jesse? Drinkin' whiskey, Jim? You're too young to be drinkin' whiskey.
translation.zh: -你没事吧，杰西？-喝威士忌？你太小了

translation.en: Not too young to shoot a man, not too young to drink whiskey.
translation.zh: 杀人不算小喝威士忌也不小

translation.en: Jim, you, uh, been with a girl yet?
translation.zh: 吉姆，你找过女生吗？

translation.en: Tonight? I was gettin' ready to turn on that Younger charm.
translation.zh: 今晚？我刚准备展现杨格家族的魅力呢

translation.en: Well, not exactly. You been with a girl ever?
translation.zh: 其实没有啦 -以前有找过女生吗？-是啊，找过一个！

translation.en: Hell, yeah, I've been with a girl!
translation.zh: -以前有找过女生吗？-是啊，找过一个！

translation.en: Look, I just-- I didn't want to get one of them paid ladies.
translation.zh: 我不想找那种要付钱的，你懂吗？

translation.en: You know what I mean? I think so.
translation.zh: 我不想找那种要付钱的，你懂吗？ 我懂

translation.en: Ahem. I mean, you, Frank, Cole, even Bob,
translation.zh: 你和弗兰克、科尔甚至鲍伯…

translation.en: you get all the girls 'cause you're good-lookin' and famous.
translation.zh: 你们有女生因为你们又英俊又有名

translation.en: They just look at me like I'm your baby brother.
translation.zh: 她们把我当你们的小弟弟

translation.en: Don't tell nobody. I swear. Not a word.
translation.zh: -不过别告诉别人-我发誓，绝口不提

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: -你没事吧？-告诉你…

translation.en: Tell you what...uh!
translation.zh: -你没事吧？-告诉你… 我也不能喝

translation.en: I can't drink good neither.
translation.zh: 我也不能喝 -我要去外面吐了-快去吧

translation.en: I'm gonna go outside and throw up. Uh! You do that. Hurry.
translation.zh: -我要去外面吐了-快去吧

translation.en: Hmm! Hey, Loni. Oh, yeah! Mm!
translation.zh: -嘿，朗尼-哦，耶

translation.en: Let's go, sugar britches.
translation.zh: 我们走，甜心

translation.en: Just call me "Lucky" Loni Packwood.
translation.zh: 叫我幸运朗尼·帕克伍德

translation.en: PARKER: The new route for the railroad is complete, sir.
translation.zh: 新的铁路路线图绘制完了，先生派克？

translation.en: Parker? Yes, sir?
translation.zh: -是，先生？-那是什么？

translation.en: What's that? That, sir?
translation.zh: -是，先生？-那是什么？ 那个，先生？詹金斯会解释的

translation.en: Jenkins will explain that.
translation.zh: 那个，先生？詹金斯会解释的

translation.en: Sir! Jenkins.
translation.zh: -先生-詹金斯

translation.en: Yes, well, uh, we have done a financial study
translation.zh: 我们对建造的成本…

translation.en: of the construction costs projecting--
translation.zh: -进行了财务调查-詹金斯！

translation.en: It's...cheaper to go around Jesse James, sir.
translation.zh: 饶过杰西·詹姆斯会省钱，先生

translation.en: Even with the detours and the extra track,
translation.zh: 哪怕有绕道和额外的轨道…

translation.en: it's-it's just...cheaper.
translation.zh: 但还是更廉价

translation.en: So you are telling me... that Jesse James has won?
translation.zh: 你是说杰西·詹姆斯赢了？

translation.en: Oh, no. No, no, no.
translation.zh: 哦，不 不…每三个月，詹姆斯帮…

translation.en: You see, every three months the James Gang circles back
translation.zh: 不…每三个月，詹姆斯帮… 都会返回密苏里的自由镇

translation.en: to the vicinity of Liberty, Missouri,
translation.zh: 都会返回密苏里的自由镇

translation.en: and they always pull a job before they return.
translation.zh: -还会在回去前打劫一次-那又如何？

translation.en: So? So there's only four banks within that travel radius they've not robbed.
translation.zh: 在那个范围内只剩四家银行不曾被他们打劫过

translation.en: Could you put men at all four?
translation.zh: -你能在四家银行都安排人吗？-没这必要

translation.en: I don't have to.
translation.zh: -你能在四家银行都安排人吗？-没这必要 我有更好的工具可以筛选出一处

translation.en: I've a much better tool at my disposal for narrowing it down to one bank.
translation.zh: 我有更好的工具可以筛选出一处

translation.en: What's that? An intense hatred of you.
translation.zh: -那是什么？-对你的极度憎恶

translation.en: Jesse.
translation.zh: 杰西

translation.en: Things a fella's gotta do to get a little respect around here.
translation.zh: （五千美元悬赏） 努力了才能得到认可

translation.en: Finally. You deserve it, Bob. It's about time. Thank you.
translation.zh: -你应得的，鲍伯，是时候了-谢谢

translation.en: Listen, Jesse, um... we got a problem. It's Cole.
translation.zh: 听着，杰西，我们有问题了，是科尔

translation.en: Ah, he's been full of vinegar lately.
translation.zh: -他最近一直充满醋意-他在计划一次打劫

translation.en: He's plannin' a job. He's what?
translation.zh: -他最近一直充满醋意-他在计划一次打劫 -他在干嘛？-他是我的哥哥，我不想惹麻烦

translation.en: Look, he's my brother... and I don't wanna start trouble.
translation.zh: -他在干嘛？-他是我的哥哥，我不想惹麻烦

translation.en: Tell me.
translation.zh: 告诉我

translation.en: Cole, are you sure? Tell you what, boys.
translation.zh: 科尔，你确定吗？ 将是有史以来最大的一票是什么？

translation.en: This is gonna be the biggest score yet.
translation.zh: 将是有史以来最大的一票是什么？

translation.en: Hyperion Bank. Two days' ride from Liberty.
translation.zh: 许珀里翁银行，两天的路程

translation.en: Got $100,000 in railroad money just sittin' there. That's in the paper, huh? Don't sound right.
translation.zh: -有修铁路用的十万美金-都在那里？肯定有问题

translation.en: If you read about it first, you'd have no problems. What are you saying, Cole?
translation.zh: -如果你先读到就可以-你在说什么？

translation.en: Jesse, I've robbed just as many banks as you have, all right? I know this town, I know this bank and I say it's an easy job.
translation.zh: 我和你抢的银行一样多我了解这家银行，这轻而易举

translation.en: I think you're forgettin' who's in charge.
translation.zh: -你忘了谁是头！-杰西

translation.en: Jesse.
translation.zh: -你忘了谁是头！-杰西 你是头？对吗？我们不再是搭档了，杰西？

translation.en: You're in charge? Huh?
translation.zh: 你是头？对吗？我们不再是搭档了，杰西？

translation.en: We ain't partners no more, Jesse? Let me get this straight.
translation.zh: 你是头？对吗？我们不再是搭档了，杰西？ 你要科尔扬格听你的使唤吗？

translation.en: You tell Cole Younger when and where to ride?
translation.zh: 你要科尔扬格听你的使唤吗？

translation.en: Cole, he didn't mean that. You're takin' sides against me now?
translation.zh: -他不是这个意思-你也反对我吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: COLE: So bein' with me is bein' against you?
translation.zh: 和我一起就是对抗你？我们不想这样

translation.en: We don't wanna do that. No.
translation.zh: 和我一起就是对抗你？我们不想这样 这些傻瓜没人想反对杰西·詹姆斯有史以来最伟大的法外狂徒！

translation.en: None of us poor idiots wanna go up against Jesse James. Greatest outlaw who ever lived.
translation.zh: 这些傻瓜没人想反对杰西·詹姆斯有史以来最伟大的法外狂徒！

translation.en: That's what it says in the paper. Weren't for you, this gang wouldn't be able
translation.zh: 报纸上说，如果没有你我们就一事无成！

translation.en: to find a goat's ass with a stick.
translation.zh: 报纸上说，如果没有你我们就一事无成！ -你最近太自大了，杰西-你这么想吗？

translation.en: You have gotten mighty full of yourself lately, Jesse.
translation.zh: -你最近太自大了，杰西-你这么想吗？

translation.en: You think so?
translation.zh: -你最近太自大了，杰西-你这么想吗？ 你们都这么想吗？

translation.en: You all do?
translation.zh: 你们都这么想吗？

translation.en: Frank?
translation.zh: 弗兰克？

translation.en: The one time one of us comes up with an idea-- A bad idea. Hey.
translation.zh: -我们中有人建议…-坏主意

translation.en: I got us through the war all right. And nearly got hanged in peacetime.
translation.zh: -我带大家熬过了战争-差点被绞死

translation.en: Geez! Cole!
translation.zh: -闭嘴！-科尔！

translation.en: FRANK: Boys, we don't want this!
translation.zh: 兄弟们，别这样！

translation.en: I'm the better soldier, Jesse! And I'm the better outlaw!
translation.zh: 我是个更出色的士兵！我是个更出色的歹徒

translation.en: You both hate the railroad! That's all that matters!
translation.zh: 你们都痛恨铁路公司！这个最重要

translation.en: You do this and Thaddeus Rains will never come West again!
translation.zh: 干吧，瑞恩斯就再也不会来西部了！

translation.en: What are you talkin' about? JIM: It's his money.
translation.zh: -什么？-是他的钱！

translation.en: He's paying the payroll out of his own fortune. You do want to hurt Thaddeus Rains, don't you, Jesse?
translation.zh: 他把自己的钱都用上了！你想对付他吧，杰西？

translation.en: FRANK: Come on, boys! Put your guns down. I still don't like it.
translation.zh: -来吧，把枪放下！-我还是不同意！

translation.en: Then let me run the show, General Lee! FRANK: Jesse!
translation.zh: -那就看我的吧，李将军！-杰西

translation.en: Jesse!
translation.zh: 杰西！

translation.en: You want it?
translation.zh: 你想要吗？

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: We hit this bank.
translation.zh: 我们去抢这所银行

translation.en: You'll be smilin' once you got that money in your pocket, cousin.
translation.zh: 等你口袋里装着钱就会笑了

translation.en: Cole Younger's gonna make everyone rich! Whoo-hoo!
translation.zh: 科尔扬格会让大家发财的！

translation.en: Hands in the air!
translation.zh: 举起手来！我们要抢银行了

translation.en: We're robbin' this bank. Move over there!
translation.zh: 举起手来！我们要抢银行了 -过去-照着做，不会有人死的，举手！

translation.en: Everybody does what they're told, nobody's gonna die.
translation.zh: -过去-照着做，不会有人死的，举手！

translation.en: Oh, no. Uhh!
translation.zh: 哦，不

translation.en: Which one should I shoot first? None of 'em.
translation.zh: -我该先射哪个人？-都不射

translation.en: Jesse! You all right?
translation.zh: 杰西，你没事吧？

translation.en: Head for the end of the street!
translation.zh: 到街尾去！

translation.en: Look! Damn!
translation.zh: -看！-该死

translation.en: Son of a bitch!
translation.zh: 他妈的！

translation.en: Move! Go on!
translation.zh: 走，快！

translation.en: Another dozen out back. They gonna rush us?
translation.zh: -后面有十几个人-他们要突袭我们？

translation.en: Nah, they're just insurance in case we run.
translation.zh: 他们要防止我们逃跑

translation.en: Inside! For God's sakes, move!
translation.zh: 进来！天啊！进来！

translation.en: Any ideas, little brother?
translation.zh: 有办法吗，小弟？

translation.en: Oh, Lord.
translation.zh: 哦，天啊

translation.en: Oh, Lord. Oh, Lord.
translation.zh: 哦，天啊

translation.en: Oh, shoot! Let's git!
translation.zh: 哦，该死！我们走！

translation.en: Fire! Come on! Come on! Look out.
translation.zh: 开火！快

translation.en: Damn!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: Let's go, boys! Come on!
translation.zh: 走，弟兄们！快！

translation.en: Let's go. Come on, boys!
translation.zh: 我们走！我们走！快，弟兄们！

translation.en: Giddyap! Come on!
translation.zh: 快！

translation.en: Ah! BOB: Jimmy!
translation.zh: 吉姆！

translation.en: JESSE: Easy, easy. Easy. It'll be okay.
translation.zh: 慢点，慢点

translation.en: Okay. Shh. You're gonna rest here now.
translation.zh: 我要躺会儿

translation.en: Bob, get some bandages. How's 'bout some whiskey?
translation.zh: 拿点绷带和威士忌来

translation.en: BOB: Okay. Too young for whiskey. I think this time we'll make an exception, Jim.
translation.zh: -好-太小了不能喝威士忌，这次例外

translation.en: Little brother, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 嘿，小弟，对不起

translation.en: All right, Jim? I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 好吗，吉姆？对不起

translation.en: It was the best time of my life.
translation.zh: 这是我人生中最精彩的一段时光

translation.en: I was famous, you know?
translation.zh: 我出名了，你知道吗？ 是的

translation.en: He was just a kid. He was old enough.
translation.zh: -他还是个孩子-他够大了

translation.en: He was a boy riding with the most famous outlaws
translation.zh: 一个男孩跟着西部最有名的匪徒

translation.en: in the West, Frank.
translation.zh: 一个男孩跟着西部最有名的匪徒 他怎么能拒绝呢？

translation.en: How was he supposed to say no to that?
translation.zh: 他怎么能拒绝呢？ 铁路公司也把他赶出来了你无法阻止他

translation.en: Railroad burned him out too. You couldn't have stopped him.
translation.zh: 铁路公司也把他赶出来了你无法阻止他

translation.en: You're a piss-poor liar for the smartest man I know.
translation.zh: 你是我所知的最聪明的人却又不知如何说谎

translation.en: A war against the railroad. What the hell was I thinkin'?
translation.zh: 一场反对铁路的战争我究竟在想什么？

translation.en: Well, I'm sure it seemed like a good idea at the time.
translation.zh: 我相信当时看起来是个好主意

translation.en: I'm out. You're out?
translation.zh: -我退出了-你退出？

translation.en: We ride for a year
translation.zh: 干了一年，人死了，你却要退出？

translation.en: and our blood gets spilled and you're just gonna quit?
translation.zh: 干了一年，人死了，你却要退出？ 下一个轮到谁，科尔？

translation.en: Who's next, Cole?
translation.zh: 下一个轮到谁，科尔？

translation.en: You? Me? Bob?
translation.zh: 你？我？鲍伯？

translation.en: Can't exactly go back to our lives, Jesse. I ain't tellin' you what to do, Clell.
translation.zh: -无路可退了，杰西-我没有叫你去做

translation.en: You want to keep ridin' with Cole, that's fine by me.
translation.zh: 继续跟着科尔，我没意见

translation.en: Frank?
translation.zh: 弗兰克？

translation.en: Well...go on. Get the hell out of here then.
translation.zh: 那就滚吧

translation.en: Don't come back when you find you can't farm with a six-gun.
translation.zh: 别等你发现无法用六响枪耕地时再回来！

translation.en: Jesse.
translation.zh: 杰西

translation.en: What are you thinkin'? There are lawmen and bounty hunters all over this county.
translation.zh: 你疯了？到处都是执法官

translation.en: I had to see you. I'm gettin' married.
translation.zh: 我必须来见你我要结婚了

translation.en: I don't understand.
translation.zh: 我不明白

translation.en: Well, she's the most wonderful woman in the world. I can't stop thinkin' about her.
translation.zh: 她是世界上最优秀的女人我每时每刻都想念着她

translation.en: Zee, look, I've quit my outlaw ways.
translation.zh: 齐，我结束我的亡命生涯了

translation.en: Come live in my home. And in my heart.
translation.zh: 到我的家和我的心里来吧

translation.en: Be my wife.
translation.zh: 做我的妻子吧

translation.en: Is that a yes?
translation.zh: 这是同意吗？

translation.en: ZEE: I never would've imagined us in a place like this.
translation.zh: 我从未想过我们会来这里

translation.en: JESSE: That's why I picked it. We can start a whole new life here, Zee.
translation.zh: 所以我选了这个地方我们可以开始新的生活

translation.en: Do you think you'll be happy here in Florida, Mr. James, without all that excitement?
translation.zh: 你在佛罗里达过平淡的生活会开心吗？

translation.en: I've got you. You keep me busy.
translation.zh: 我有你啊，你会让我充实的

translation.en: I figure we can go over to the hotel, get checked in.
translation.zh: 我们能去酒店，开个房间…

translation.en: And then I wanna do somethin' I've been thinkin' about doin'
translation.zh: 然后做我好久以来都想做的事

translation.en: for a long, long time.
translation.zh: 然后做我好久以来都想做的事 等等，有些事得等到结婚以后

translation.en: ZEE: Now wait a minute! There are certain things that have to wait
translation.zh: 等等，有些事得等到结婚以后

translation.en: until after the wedding. Driver, change of plans. Could you take us to the nearest church, please?
translation.zh: 车夫，改变计划带我们去最近的教堂

translation.en: MAN: "Jesse Woodson James."
translation.zh: “杰西·伍德森·詹姆斯”

translation.en: Jesse James. The Jesse James?
translation.zh: 杰西·詹姆斯就是那个杰西·詹姆斯？

translation.en: I could've lied, I guess, but I want this marriage to be legal.
translation.zh: 我可以撒谎但是我希望我的婚姻合法

translation.en: And I want you to know that I'm trying to start a new life here so I'm depending on your--
translation.zh: 我要重新开始生活所以我需要你的…

translation.en: Discretion. Discretion.
translation.zh: -酌处权？-酌处权

translation.en: Sir, I'm a man of the cloth... Well, thank you.
translation.zh: -先生，我是上帝的仆人-谢谢

translation.en: ...who, uh, needs to repair a leaky church roof.
translation.zh: 我需要修补漏水的教堂顶

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: Now, let's have a drink.
translation.zh: 现在让我们喝一杯

translation.en: In the church?
translation.zh: -在教堂里？-是圣餐！

translation.en: Communion!
translation.zh: -在教堂里？-是圣餐！ 祝你快乐

translation.en: MAN: Have a good day, now. All right, everybody. Hands in the air! This is a robbery! Move! Move!
translation.zh: 把手举起来！抢劫啦！快！

translation.en: The safe! Now!
translation.zh: 保险箱，快点！

translation.en: Of course. Of course.
translation.zh: 当然！

translation.en: Sir? What?
translation.zh: -先生？-什么？

translation.en: Where's Jesse James?
translation.zh: 杰西·詹姆斯在哪里？

translation.en: This here's the Younger Gang. Ya understand? The Younger Gang!
translation.zh: 我们是扬格帮！明白吗？

translation.en: But the Youngers ride with Jesse James.
translation.zh: 可是扬格和杰西·詹姆斯是一伙的

translation.en: Hey! You wanna die? No.
translation.zh: -嘿，你想死吗？-不想

translation.en: Did ride. No more, ya understand?
translation.zh: 曾经是，不再是了明白吗？

translation.en: The safe! Now! All right? All right, all right!
translation.zh: -保险箱，快！好吗？-好

translation.en: You know, Jesse James never went around yellin' at folks.
translation.zh: 杰西·詹姆斯从不对人大吼大叫

translation.en: Ah, Cole, this is the best score yet!
translation.zh: 这是最棒的一次！

translation.en: It's still takin' too long. People used to snap to.
translation.zh: 花的时间太长了以前人们听话多了
