translation.en: Yeah, well, that was because of the reputation the gang had.
translation.zh: 那是因为有杰…团伙的名望

translation.en: As long as people think that Jesse is still ridin' we're not gonna get the respect we deserve.
translation.zh: 如果人们认为杰西还在干我们就没有地位

translation.en: Cole, we're outlaws. Not the most respectable job if you know what I mean.
translation.zh: 我们是匪徒这份工作本来就没什么地位

translation.en: Bob, leave me alone, all right? Go on.
translation.zh: 鲍伯，让我独自呆会好吗？去吧

translation.en: Hmm. "Hmm" what?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: "For the life of the James Gang
translation.zh: “詹姆斯帮并非只知道杀戮

translation.en: "wasn't all robbing and shooting and killing.
translation.zh: “詹姆斯帮并非只知道杀戮 这伙年轻人对女人也很有品位…

translation.en: "These young Missouri bucks had a taste for the ladies,
translation.zh: 这伙年轻人对女人也很有品位…

translation.en: especially the handsome and charismatic Jesse James."
translation.zh: 尤其是帅气充满魅力的杰西·詹姆斯” 你说什么？

translation.en: Beg your pardon?
translation.zh: 你说什么？ 《西部神枪杰西·詹姆斯的真实事迹》

translation.en: "Blazing guns of the west. True stories of Jesse James."
translation.zh: 《西部神枪杰西·詹姆斯的真实事迹》

translation.en: Only a dime in the hotel lobby.
translation.zh: -酒店的廉价小说-让我看看

translation.en: Let me see that. I'm not finished.
translation.zh: -酒店的廉价小说-让我看看 我还没完呢

translation.en: "When he sauntered into a saloon, "his spurs janglin' and his pockets full of gold,
translation.zh: “当他慢步走进一个酒吧他的马刺发出声响…

translation.en: the ladies flocked around him like flies to a candied apple."
translation.zh: 女士们如同苍蝇飞向冰糖苹果般蜂拥而上”

translation.en: As I said, "hmm."
translation.zh: 就像我刚才说的

translation.en: Now, sweetie...
translation.zh: 甜心…

translation.en: y'all wouldn't go believin' one of them silly dime novels, would ya?
translation.zh: 你不会相信这廉价的小说吧？

translation.en: Swimming.
translation.zh: 游泳

translation.en: Swimming is good.
translation.zh: 游泳不错

translation.en: Don't turn around.
translation.zh: 别往后看

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: If you don't see it, then it's not real.
translation.zh: 如果你看不见，就不是真的

translation.en: [ECHOING] Jesse James!
translation.zh: 杰西·詹姆斯！

translation.en: You're under arrest!
translation.zh: 你被捕了！

translation.en: They arrested Jesse!
translation.zh: 他们抓了杰西！

translation.en: What have you done? What's that, Bob?
translation.zh: -你做了什么？-怎么回事，鲍伯？

translation.en: What have you done, Cole?
translation.zh: 你做了什么，科尔？

translation.en: I ain't done nothin', Bob. Swear.
translation.zh: 我什么都没做，鲍伯我发誓

translation.en: Swear on Jimmy's grave.
translation.zh: 在吉姆的墓前发誓

translation.en: Bob, you know Cole would never do such a thing.
translation.zh: 鲍伯，你知道科尔绝对不会做这种事的

translation.en: He and Jesse are best friends. Cousins.
translation.zh: 他和杰西是最好的朋友 表兄弟，有血缘关系

translation.en: Blood brothers.
translation.zh: 表兄弟，有血缘关系

translation.en: Bob.
translation.zh: 鲍伯

translation.en: Sorry, Cole.
translation.zh: 抱歉，科尔

translation.en: We're moving you tomorrow. But I like the presidential suite.
translation.zh: -明天就要转移你-但是我喜欢这总统套房

translation.en: You'll get a similar room. The hotel's in Washington D.C. Nice.
translation.zh: 你会得到类似的一间房的但是酒店位于华盛顿

translation.en: You're not gonna get a fair trial here in front of a jury of Jesse James sympathizers.
translation.zh: 你在这里得不到公正的审判你有很多的同情者

translation.en: Oh, but I'll get a fair trail with a jury bought off by Thaddeus Rains? That's the idea.
translation.zh: -瑞恩斯收买的陪审团就公正吗？-没错

translation.en: Did you order our houses burned down? Not that day.
translation.zh: -你下令烧了我们的房子？-那天不是我

translation.en: I'm guilty of many things, but...
translation.zh: 我对很多事情感到内疚…

translation.en: that-- That was Mr. Thaddeus Rains and Parker that day.
translation.zh: 但那是迪厄斯·瑞恩斯先生和派克干的

translation.en: This was you, by the way. You almost ended my career before it began.
translation.zh: -顺便说下，这是你干的-你差点让我一事无成

translation.en: Pity.
translation.zh: 可惜

translation.en: We're gonna hang you, you know?
translation.zh: 我们要绞死你，你知道的

translation.en: Yeah, I figured.
translation.zh: 是的，我猜到了

translation.en: Was it worth it?
translation.zh: 值得吗？

translation.en: I should've just killed Thaddeus Rains.
translation.zh: -我应该杀了瑞恩斯-如果是我，我就这么做

translation.en: That's what I'd have done.
translation.zh: -我应该杀了瑞恩斯-如果是我，我就这么做 我还没被绞死呢

translation.en: I'm not hanged yet.
translation.zh: 我还没被绞死呢

translation.en: You cocky little bastard!
translation.zh: 你这个自负的小混蛋！

translation.en: Oh, you'll miss me.
translation.zh: 哦，你会想念我的

translation.en: No. I'll hang you.
translation.zh: 不，我会绞死你

translation.en: But I might miss you a little bit.
translation.zh: 但是我或许会有点想你

translation.en: About face! March. March.
translation.zh: 转身 前进

translation.en: Come on, you!
translation.zh: 你给我过来！

translation.en: So this is he.
translation.zh: 就是他

translation.en: I remember you. You're Parker.
translation.zh: 我记得你 你是派克，我也记得你

translation.en: I remember you too. You killed my ma.
translation.zh: 你是派克，我也记得你 -你杀了我的妈妈-你怎么知道？

translation.en: How did you know?
translation.zh: -你杀了我的妈妈-你怎么知道？

translation.en: Not such a menace now, is he, Pinkerton?
translation.zh: 他现在没什么威胁了，是吗？

translation.en: If that's the way you feel, I could always take off his irons.
translation.zh: 我随时可以给他松绑

translation.en: You stole thousands, cost me tens of millions of dollars, months of delays in construction.
translation.zh: 你让我损失了上百万延误了几个月的工期

translation.en: I wish I could hang you every single morning for a century.
translation.zh: 我好久以来就想整个世纪每天早上都把你绞死

translation.en: Oh, you like that?
translation.zh: 你觉得如何？

translation.en: Solid gold. My father had it made. When he started this railroad, he gave it to me.
translation.zh: 我父亲开始修建铁路时定做的

translation.en: I'll give it to my son when he takes over the company and he'll give it to his son.
translation.zh: 我会传给我的儿子他会给他的儿子

translation.en: The right sort of men will always run this country, Jesse James, not your sort.
translation.zh: 有类人永远会统治这个国家杰西·詹姆斯，不是你这类人

translation.en: You'll always suffer. And you haven't changed anything.
translation.zh: 你将永远受苦而且你什么都没有改变

translation.en: I made you think twice about burnin' folks' homes down,
translation.zh: 我让你再三考虑烧房子的事

translation.en: now, didn't I?
translation.zh: 我让你再三考虑烧房子的事 -我们到华盛顿再谈-我们上同一列火车？

translation.en: We'll speak again in Washington.
translation.zh: -我们到华盛顿再谈-我们上同一列火车？

translation.en: Oh, you're comin' on the same train?
translation.zh: -我们到华盛顿再谈-我们上同一列火车？ 好吧，告诉你，我会拜访你的

translation.en: JESSE: Well, I'll tell you what. I'm gonna have to pay you a visit.
translation.zh: 好吧，告诉你，我会拜访你的

translation.en: Big words. It's a promise.
translation.zh: -夸口-我发誓

translation.en: Get him on board.
translation.zh: 把他带上来

translation.en: Open up!
translation.zh: 打开！

translation.en: Hook him up. Come with me, boy.
translation.zh: 把他锁上跟我来，小子

translation.en: Take him back.
translation.zh: 带过来 现在交出你们的枪

translation.en: Now your guns.
translation.zh: 现在交出你们的枪

translation.en: I don't like it.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢这样我们能对付他

translation.en: We can handle him.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢这样我们能对付他 在过去的十秒内他至少能三次抢你的枪！

translation.en: In the ten seconds we have been in this car, I've seen you get close enough for Jesse James to grab your guns at least three times!
translation.zh: 在过去的十秒内他至少能三次抢你的枪！

translation.en: And believe me... if he lays a finger on one of your guns
translation.zh: 如果他的手指碰到你的枪

translation.en: you are all, and I mean, all... dead men.
translation.zh: 你们就…我是说所有的人会成死人！

translation.en: He's chained up.
translation.zh: 他被锁起来了

translation.en: They'll put that on your tombstone. Your guns.
translation.zh: 我会把它刻在你的墓碑上你的枪！

translation.en: Give me two good cards.
translation.zh: 给我两张好牌

translation.en: Everybody ante up. MAN 1: Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 大家，给钱

translation.en: Yeah. MAN 2: Yep.
translation.zh: -对-好

translation.en: Hey, stupid!
translation.zh: 嘿，蠢货！

translation.en: Yeah, you.
translation.zh: 说你呢！

translation.en: Glad to see you know your name, you dumb shit.
translation.zh: 很高兴你知道自己的名字你这蠢货！

translation.en: What are you saying, boy?
translation.zh: -你在说什么，小子？-我认识你

translation.en: I think I recognize you. How?
translation.zh: -你在说什么，小子？-我认识你 怎么认识？

translation.en: I think I saw you leavin' by the front door just as I was comin' in the back.
translation.zh: 我从后门进来时你在前门

translation.en: You shut up now, boy!
translation.zh: 你给我闭嘴，小子！

translation.en: Yeah. Your wife said you did that to her too.
translation.zh: 是啊，你的老婆说你对她也是如此

translation.en: Will this shut you up?
translation.zh: 这个会让你闭嘴吗？

translation.en: You know, I could do this without the gun.
translation.zh: 我不用枪就能做到

translation.en: Just makes things easier.
translation.zh: 这样更容易点

translation.en: What the hell is that?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: Vengeance. Outside. Get him on the roof! Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 该死！出去，到车顶上去！

translation.en: You stay put, gentlemen.
translation.zh: 你们待在这里，先生们

translation.en: Nice shot!
translation.zh: -打得漂亮-谢谢

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: -打得漂亮-谢谢 现在去救我的丈夫！

translation.en: Go get my husband.
translation.zh: 现在去救我的丈夫！

translation.en: There's only four of 'em! Move, you fools! Move!
translation.zh: -他们只有四个人！-走，蠢货！快！

translation.en: Come on! Quickly! This way.
translation.zh: 快跑！这边

translation.en: Do it.
translation.zh: 开枪啊！

translation.en: That was for my ma. Now, this is for everybody else.
translation.zh: 那是为我妈这是为所有的人

translation.en: He's too important, James! They'll set the army on you!
translation.zh: 不，他们会派军队来围剿你！

translation.en: You and your wife.
translation.zh: 你和你的妻子

translation.en: That is a nice watch you got there. Hand it over.
translation.zh: 你这只怀表很漂亮交出来

translation.en: If I can get you today...
translation.zh: 如果今天我能逮到你…

translation.en: you damn sure know I can kill you anytime I want now that I'm free.
translation.zh: 那你应该知道我随时都可以杀了你

translation.en: You sleep on that for the next 20 years. Give it to me.
translation.zh: 今后的二十年都给我记住！给我！

translation.en: FRANK: Get your hands up, now!
translation.zh: 举起手来！

translation.en: Tennessee.
translation.zh: 田纳西州

translation.en: The Railroad has no business in Tennessee.
translation.zh: 铁路公司在那里没有业务

translation.en: Therefore, I have no interest in the state of Tennessee.
translation.zh: 因此我对田纳西州也没兴趣

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: I'd just as soon kill you, Jesse James.
translation.zh: 我可以杀了你，杰西·詹姆斯

translation.en: But chasin' you takes up too much of my time.
translation.zh: 但是追捕你太浪费我的时间了

translation.en: Fair enough.
translation.zh: 有道理

translation.en: Jesse James.
translation.zh: 杰西·詹姆斯？

translation.en: Come on! Let's ride!
translation.zh: 来，出发！

translation.en: You get arrested again, I'll kill you.
translation.zh: -如果再被捕，我就杀了你！-是，夫人

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: -如果再被捕，我就杀了你！-是，夫人 不敢相信我为你炸了一列火车你真是不凡的女子

translation.en: I can't believe I had to blow up a train for you.
translation.zh: 不敢相信我为你炸了一列火车你真是不凡的女子

translation.en: Well, you are a hell of a woman.
translation.zh: 不敢相信我为你炸了一列火车你真是不凡的女子 -别耍贫嘴-是，夫人

translation.en: Don't swear! Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: -别耍贫嘴-是，夫人

translation.en: I missed you, cousin. I missed you too, cousin.
translation.zh: -我真想念你，表弟-我也想你 你知道…

translation.en: You know, uh...
translation.zh: 你知道…

translation.en: You know, when you, uh, when you got caught some people thought maybe, I had somethin' to do with it.
translation.zh: 当你被捕时他们以为这和我有关

translation.en: The thought never crossed my mind.
translation.zh: -我从未这样想过-很好

translation.en: Things changed when you quit the gang, Jesse.
translation.zh: 你退出后有些变动了

translation.en: For example, I'm the one who now says, "let's ride." He ain't bad at it. Yeah?
translation.zh: 现在我说“出发”他说得不赖

translation.en: It's tougher than it looks. Yeah!
translation.zh: -不容易-你哪里找来的人？

translation.en: Where'd you get these riders?
translation.zh: -不容易-你哪里找来的人？ 不是我找的，齐瑞拉找的她绝对是个亡命之徒

translation.en: Well, we didn't. Zerelda did. Turns out your wife makes a hell of an outlaw.
translation.zh: 不是我找的，齐瑞拉找的她绝对是个亡命之徒

translation.en: BOB: So, what's the plan, Jesse?
translation.zh: 杰西，你有什么打算？

translation.en: Well, Bob, I think my wife and I are gonna go and buy a farm.
translation.zh: -我们准备买个农场-农场？

translation.en: A farm? Down in Tennessee. Hmm. All right.
translation.zh: -在田纳西州-好吧

translation.en: You, uh, you wanna maybe, ride with the Younger Gang for a while before you do that?
translation.zh: 想和扬格帮待一阵子吗？

translation.en: Bye, boys.
translation.zh: 再见，弟兄们

translation.en: Tom.
translation.zh: 汤姆

translation.en: FRANK: Tennessee, huh? Yeah, I think so.
translation.zh: -田纳西啊？-是的

translation.en: I'll meet you there in a couple weeks. I'll see you soon.
translation.zh: -过两周我们那里见-回头见

translation.en: And, uh...thanks for that distraction back there.
translation.zh: -过两周我们那里见-回头见 谢谢你们转移了他们的注意见鬼，他们几乎没有注意到我们

translation.en: Hell, they hardly even noticed us.
translation.zh: 谢谢你们转移了他们的注意见鬼，他们几乎没有注意到我们

translation.en: Mrs. James? Shall we?
translation.zh: -詹姆斯夫人？-走吗？ -当然走啦-弗兰克，骑兵们

translation.en: Shall we, indeed. Frank. Rangers.
translation.zh: -当然走啦-弗兰克，骑兵们

translation.en: Tennessee? I'll explain on the way.
translation.zh: -田纳西州？-我路上会解释的

translation.en: All right, boys.
translation.zh: 好吧，弟兄们

translation.en: Let's ride! Hah!
translation.zh: 出发！

translation.en: When were you plannin' on tellin' me?
translation.zh: -你什么时候告诉我？-我已经说了

translation.en: I just did. Only because I asked?
translation.zh: -你什么时候告诉我？-我已经说了 因为我问了？

translation.en: Damn! Am I ever gonna win with you? Don't change the subject.
translation.zh: -见鬼，我什么时候可以赢你？-别换话题
